comments: Well I've played this game since it lunched and I love the game but I will give it 2 stars because after every update I am getting ridiculous amount of lag that it causes the game to become unplayable. I can't even land on the ground anymore 7 of 10 matches it locks me in the air and I cant even land and the other 3 of 10 I die because of lag. This issue become real after season 1 started I didn't have such problem in season 0 and my phone is perfectly fine for this game too. I will give it higher rating after this issue is gone. Thanks

Wow, you just did it in the starting update banning cheaters but after a month cheaters were back.. What?! It makes the game ruined and shamed because cheaters are still there. So please do your move to get rid of the cheaters. I love this game but it lacks security hack please improve

I got some problem. My device cannot see the 'ground' when its near enough. It span at least for 1 or 2 km and i can see through the 'ground' i can also see trees, bushes, stones and buildings on top of high ground which usually blocked by ground. And that make matters more worse, u can see players walking around on top of hill when im from the bottom

Good Job Developers. Firstly the gaming is really awesome. The graphics is good according tho Phones. But Need some more updates and correction. 1. Add all Best weapons of the world. 2. Ban the cheaters. 3. Add talking feature to Enemy also like in PUBG. 4. Real physics of driving. 5.Add some simplicity in controls but advance. 6.Free diamonds to those who doesn't get that yet.

ONE WORD LAAGGG!! The game would be very good if I could move 2 steps without lagging. The developers are adding new and uncalled for features in every update, rather than improving the gameplay. The game used to be better before all these updates. Disappointed.

ROS is laggy in Android. I'm using a quad core and 3GB phone and yet it still laggy (even at lowest graphic setting). I'm able to play other network games (e.g. Free Fire Battlegrounds at Ultra Setting) without this lag (so my network connection is okay). This makes it not enjoyable to play. :(

comments: Just started using Wordscapes, but I really like it so far... Appears addictive, so don't play if you only have 5 mins spare! üòâ
Would have given it 5 üåü if it didn't start to freeze my phone. Updated to 5 üåü. The update seems to have resolved the freezing issue. Works great! Only issue is that it is still a battery hog.
I want to say thank you to Kenny for helpling me solve the issue with the coin. This is an excellent app. I really enjoy playing if i could rate more then 5 i would. Thank you so much for responding.
I love it. Can't stop playing... Love the idea that I keep finding words that could belong to the puzzle and It earns me more points.
Fun, get to test my brain for awhile (I need that), & it's addictive. Good job!! Thanks!
Not all players knows all English words, so it is better to add feature like to show the meaning of a word once the player found this the first time.

comments: I have an account. I used to play to an old phone. Now I've got a new phone and when I installed the game, it made me play the tutorial again and it took 10 minutes to reach the settings. After I was finally able to reach the settings, I tried to LOG IN EXISTING ACCOUNT and it said that I need to become >> LEVEL 8 << to unlock this feature. I could never imagine a game doing that. This is absolutely insane. Reach level 8 to a new account in order to log in to my old existing account. And why do I have to play with a new account in the first place? Why not the usual log in screen that every game has!!!

The game is fine but people leave the game in between match or before match.  Its irritating  coz we lose without any reason.  The punishment  for this behavior  is so less.  Just 5 credit points.  Which is just too dumb.  The developers should punish them more or else its too frustrating  and people  will quit and choose other games similar to this

I would give 5 star but now i only give 1 start because today i just format my handphone when i install back my mobile legend and play all the tutorials, it tell me need to reach level 8 then can connect back my account!! If i got a account, why should i waste a lot of time to leveling?? Please ASAP to fix the problem

lag lag lag.. fix lag problem.. other game rarely lag at important time yet this game multiple time.. even so all the fans ml still love this game... just lag will make stress and not fun to play.. i pay a lot of money to play fine skin and hero but its all no fun anymore due to lag non stop .. well sure the latest phone can play without problem.. but what about the low one.. cant even move properly making the player like suicide and more afk..

The game is good, but for the linking account part is ridiculous. I don't understand why must be level 8 then can logon to existing account. It is wasting our precious time just to play so many useless matches until level 8 to change back to your exiating account. Please i would you suggest to change your system of changing of existing account. Thanks

Why after every time u update the app I keep stuck at loading page and unable to enter the game ? I have to uninstall and play until reach lvl 8 only I can link back to my account. Pls don't waste my time. Fix this problem pls.
description: Join your friends in a brand new 5v5 MOBA showdown against real human opponents, Mobile Legends: Bang Bang! Choose your  favorite heroes and build the perfect team with your comrades-in-arms! 10-second matchmaking, 10-minute battles. Laning, jungling, tower rushing, team battles, all the fun of PC MOBAs and action games in the palm of your hand! Feed your eSports spirit!Mobile Legends: Bang Bang, 2017‚Äôs brand new mobile eSports masterpiece. Shatter your opponents with the touch of your finger and claim the crown of strongest Challenger!Your phone thirsts for battle!Features: 1. Classic MOBA Maps, 5v5 Battles Real-time 5v5 battles against real opponents. Fight over 3 lanes to take the enemy‚Äôs tower. 4 jungle areas. 18 defense towers. 2 Wild Bosses. Complete reproductions of classic MOBA maps. Full-on 5v5, Human vs. Human battles. A triumphant return to genuine MOBA gameplay.2. Win with Teamwork & Strategy Block damage, control the enemy, and heal teammates! Choose from Tanks, Mages, Marksmen, Assassins, Supports, etc. to anchor your team or be match MVP! New heroes are constantly being released!3. Fair Fights, Carry Your Team to Victory Just like classic MOBAs, there is no hero training or paying for stats. Winners and losers are decided based on skill and ability on this fair and balanced platform for competitive gaming. Play to Win, not Pay to Win.4. Simple Controls, Easy to Master With a virtual joystick on the left and skill buttons on the right, 2 fingers are all you need to become a master! Autolock and target sifting allow you to last hit to your heart‚Äôs content. Never miss! And a convenient tap-to-equip system lets you focus on the thrill of battle!5. 10 Second Matchmaking, 10 Minute Matches Matchmaking only takes 10 seconds, and battles last 10 minutes, glossing over the quiet early-game leveling up and jumping right into intense battles. Less boring waiting and repetitive farming, and more thrilling action and fist-pumping victories. At any place, at any moment, just pick up your phone, fire up the game, and immerse yourself in heart-pounding MOBA competition.6. Smart Offline AI Assistance In most MOBAs, a dropped connection means hanging your team out to dry, but with Mobile Legends: Bang Bang‚Äôs powerful reconnection system, if you get dropped, you can be back in the battle in seconds. And while you‚Äôre offline, your character will be controlled by our AI system to avoid a 5-on-4 situation.PLEASE NOTE! Mobile Legends: Bang Bang is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Mobile Legends: Bang Bang.Contact Us You can get customer service assistance via the [Contact Us] button in the game to help you with any problems you may encounter while playing. You can also find us on the following platforms. We welcome all of your Mobile Legends: Bang Bang thoughts and suggestions:Customer Service Email: MobileLegendsGame@gmail.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/MobileLegendsGameYouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/MobileLegends5v5MOBA
descriptionHTML:
Join your friends in a brand new 5v5 MOBA showdown against real human opponents, Mobile Legends: Bang Bang! Choose your favorite heroes and build the perfect team with your comrades-in-arms! 10-second matchmaking, 10-minute battles. Laning, jungling, tower rushing, team battles, all the fun of PC MOBAs and action games in the palm of your hand! Feed your eSports spirit!

Mobile Legends: Bang Bang, 2017’s brand new mobile eSports masterpiece. Shatter your opponents with the touch of your finger and claim the crown of strongest Challenger!

Your phone thirsts for battle!

Features:

1. Classic MOBA Maps, 5v5 Battles
Real-time 5v5 battles against real opponents. Fight over 3 lanes to take the enemy’s tower. 4 jungle areas. 18 defense towers. 2 Wild Bosses. Complete reproductions of classic MOBA maps. Full-on 5v5, Human vs. Human battles. A triumphant return to genuine MOBA gameplay.

2. Win with Teamwork & Strategy
Block damage, control the enemy, and heal teammates! Choose from Tanks, Mages, Marksmen, Assassins, Supports, etc. to anchor your team or be match MVP! New heroes are constantly being released!

3. Fair Fights, Carry Your Team to Victory
Just like classic MOBAs, there is no hero training or paying for stats. Winners and losers are decided based on skill and ability on this fair and balanced platform for competitive gaming. Play to Win, not Pay to Win.

4. Simple Controls, Easy to Master
With a virtual joystick on the left and skill buttons on the right, 2 fingers are all you need to become a master! Autolock and target sifting allow you to last hit to your heart’s content. Never miss! And a convenient tap-to-equip system lets you focus on the thrill of battle!

5. 10 Second Matchmaking, 10 Minute Matches
Matchmaking only takes 10 seconds, and battles last 10 minutes, glossing over the quiet early-game leveling up and jumping right into intense battles. Less boring waiting and repetitive farming, and more thrilling action and fist-pumping victories. At any place, at any moment, just pick up your phone, fire up the game, and immerse yourself in heart-pounding MOBA competition.

6. Smart Offline AI Assistance
In most MOBAs, a dropped connection means hanging your team out to dry, but with Mobile Legends: Bang Bang’s powerful reconnection system, if you get dropped, you can be back in the battle in seconds. And while you’re offline, your character will be controlled by our AI system to avoid a 5-on-4 situation.

PLEASE NOTE! Mobile Legends: Bang Bang is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Mobile Legends: Bang Bang.

Contact Us
You can get customer service assistance via the [Contact Us] button in the game to help you with any problems you may encounter while playing. You can also find us on the following platforms. We welcome all of your Mobile Legends: Bang Bang thoughts and suggestions:

Customer Service Email: MobileLegendsGame@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MobileLegendsGame
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/MobileLegends5v5MOBA
developerAddress: UNIT 17, 9/F, TOWER A, NEW MADARIN PLAZA, No. 14 SCIENCE MUSEUM RD, TST, KL
recentChanges: 3. [Odette‚Äôs Jigsaw Event] Complete quest to win Odette for free!
4. When preparing for battle, players can use the [Custom Skills] function to change the position of their skills.
5. When level 30 players complete Daily Quests, the experience gained will be converted into Emblem Fragments.
summary: Enjoy the Classic MOBA on Your Mobile. Challenge Top Players All Over the World!
title: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang

comments: This game is great but for some reason the game won't let one if my sims stay married to another sim, I've had them get married 4 times and I've even had a wedding party by when I closed the game and started playing ut they were no longer married, although the party was still going on which makes no sense. I've had to have them get engaged 9 times and even though it doesn't save that they get engages it for some reason saves the relationship points. It doesn't bother me that much but I would like to know how to fix it or for there to ve an update to fix it. Other than that this game is one of the most fun I've played in a while and I love it, this is truy a fun game.

It's a great game but it could be better. I wanted it to be more like TheSims 4 and Freeplay. I wish we could do more with our sims. I would like more control on what they get to do. Right now, i just find myself keeping my sims at work because thats basically the only action they can do in the game. I dont really have time add on to my home because making money takes forever unless you buy packages. It would be nice if they could earn more money as they progress in their careers. I hope in the future they will add more features and make it more enjoyable.

As with all previous sims games is fantastically interactive and a true enjoyment to play however Electronic Arts and Mavis have fallen into the Play Store down fall and advertising as free to play but trying to get players to buy items of in the game to progress faster. I'm sure like many others this is a great annoyance to me and I'd rather pay a one-off price to play the game as I see fit then spend copious amounts to advance by buying Sim's cash and simoleons! Please sort it out and make this game great again!

It is OK,  however it is not what the game was letting on. It's more of like a game like Simpson tapped out or something. Like any mobile game, actions take hours to complete and you have energy that can run out stopping you from being able to play for a while. This is EA's way of getting you to buy their over priced boosts. But it is not bad, it is fun and enjoyable, and it is cool to design your sims and construct your own house. I also kinda like the feature that you can buy new clothes rather than using the simple clothing you can wear at the beginning of the game. Overall it is fun and enjoyable, but it doesn't feel like a sims game

Update 10.3.2018: So far so good, I'm getting more familiar with the controls and stuff. The only concern for now is whenever I play for extended period of time, like 20-30 mins, my device's temperature kept on increasing and it's quite uncomfortable to hold. I wish the devs can optimise the game better for older devices, I'm using Honor 5X with the Snapdragon 616 btw...

I love the sims. Been playing it since I first had a computer. When this ame got release I was excited and its fun and i have my fiance playing the game too. However, i can no longer progress through the different careers, hobby, and relationships. im stuck at level 7 and wont give me the option to perform events. Please fix or share details on how to progress.
description: Express your creativity as you customize your Sims‚Äô distinct appearances and unique personalities, giving them traits and having fun with fashion and hairstyles. Effortlessly build your Sims the perfect home, choosing favorite designs and d√©cor, with more detail than ever before on mobile. Experience the rich and entertaining moments of your Sims‚Äô lives as they accomplish career goals, pursue hobbies, develop relationships, and improve their Lifestyle. Party with friends, socialize around town, attend special events, and give Stickers to your favorite Sims. What stories will you tell? CREATE UNIQUE SIMSCustomize Sims‚Äô appearances, hairstyles, outfits, makeup, and accessories. From nose to toes, there are endless possibilities! Then put together an unforgettable wardrobe when you team up with Izzy Fabulous in the Fashion Shop. Choose personality traits for each Sim, like Active or Musical, and add more as your Sims gain life experience.BUILD THE PERFECT HOMEDesign your Sims a home where they can experience all that life has to offer. Effortlessly personalize home layouts and designs, selecting from a variety of furniture, appliances, decorations, and even themed collections. Then take your Sims out to discover awesome, customizable venues like a fashion studio, restaurant, and nightclub. SHAPE YOUR SIMS‚Äô LIFESTYLE Guide the stories of your Sims‚Äô lives from careers and hobbies to relationships and families. Pick exciting careers like Fashion Designer and Doctor, and hobbies like Cooking and Guitar playing. Have friendly and romantic relationships with other Sims and take Risky Actions like trying for a kiss or inventing an experimental recipe. Start a family and create a path for future generations by passing down powerful Heirlooms. PLAY TOGETHERHost and attend parties with other Sims where you can socialize and earn rewards. Show off your amazing house, develop romantic relationships, and even decide to move in with other people‚Äôs Sims. Join special daily events like Speed Dating in the Park or the Market Square Music Festival. Plus, meet other players‚Äô Sims at parties or around town and use Stickers to let them know if they‚Äôre Cute, Hot, or Fabulous!There are endless ways to connect when you craft big and small moments for your Sims, and see where life takes them in The Sims Mobile!____________Important Consumer Information. Some images shown may contain in-app purchases. This app: Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply). Requires acceptance of EA‚Äôs Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Includes in-game advertising. Collects data through third party analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details). Allows players to communicate via the in-game party chat feature. Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. The app uses Google Play Game Services. Log out of Google Play Game Services before installation if you don‚Äôt want to share your game play with friends.User Agreement: http://terms.ea.comPrivacy and Cookie Policy: http://privacy.ea.comVisit http://help.ea.com for assistance or inquiriesEA may retire online features after 30 days' notice posted on www.ea.com/service-updates.

descriptionHTML:
Are you tired of the old fashioned word search interfaces?
Do you want to enjoy a totally new experience of word puzzle game?
★★★ Now, you can download Word Cross and play on BOARDS for FREE! ★★★

Word Cross is a creative crossword puzzle game which can inspire your passion for brain challenges. It includes all the essences of word scramble games to make you feel totally ADDICTIVE & ENTERTAINING.

➤ New & Fresh Look: If you like to play board games and puzzle games, you must love the clean and fresh BOARD UI for your first sight.

➤ Handy & Easy to Play: You can easily swipe the letters to form a specific hidden word. It’s easy to play and fun to master for everyone.

➤ Surprising Bonus: Login everyday and get daily bonus, also, you will get coins after finding out the Extra Words which don't present on the crossword board.

➤ Over 2,000 Exciting Challenges: It starts easy and becomes challenging fast. And you can test your limits of the words you know. More levels are on the go.

➤ 100% Addictive Word Game: You’ll never experience a dull moment for it! Play this crossword puzzle once and you won’t be able to put it down!

☆ HOW TO PLAY ☆
- Swipe the letters to line up words to fill up the blanks horizontally and vertically on the board
- Tap the “Shuffle” button to change the order of letters
- Tap "Ask Friends" when you get stuck and get rewards
- Tap the “Hints” button to get clues
- Get more hints with coins by purchasing or watching videos

★ FEATURES ★
• Nice & Clean BOARD for you (Stay tuned for customizable themes)
• More than 2000 Challenges
• FREE to get Daily Bonus
• Find words with bonus to collect more coins
• Simple & Easy to play, hard to beat gameplay

descriptionHTML:
Join millions of players worldwide as you build your village, raise a clan, and compete in epic Clan Wars!

Mustachioed Barbarians, fire wielding Wizards, and other unique troops are waiting for you!

New Features:
● Journey to the Builder Base and discover new buildings and characters in a new mysterious world.
● Battle with all new troops, including Raged Barbarian, Sneaky Archer, Boxer Giant, Bomber, Cannon Cart, and the new Hero Battle Machine.
● Go head to head with other players in the new Versus battle mode.

Classic Features:
● Join a Clan of fellow players or start your own and invite friends.
● Fight in Clan Wars as a team against other players across the globe.
● Defend your village with a multitude of cannons, bombs, traps, mortars, and walls.
● Fight against the Goblin King in a campaign through the realm.
● Plan unique battle strategies with countless combinations of spells, troops, and Heroes!
● Friendly Challenges, Friendly Wars, and special events.
● Train unique troops with multiple levels of upgrades.

PLEASE NOTE! Clash of Clans is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Clash of Clans.

A network connection is also required.

Support: Chief, are you having problems? Visit http://supercell.helpshift.com/a/clash-of-clans/ or http://supr.cl/ClashForum or contact us in game by going to Settings > Help and Support.

Privacy Policy: http://www.supercell.net/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service: http://www.supercell.net/terms-of-service/

Parent’s Guide: http://www.supercell.net/parents

descriptionHTML:
Get ready to soil your plants as a mob of fun-loving zombies is about to invade your home. Use your arsenal of 49 zombie-zapping plants — peashooters, wall-nuts, cherry bombs and more — to mulchify 26 types of zombies before they break down your door.

This app offers in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings

WINNER OF OVER 30 GAME OF THE YEAR AWARDS*

50 FUN-DEAD LEVELS
Conquer all 50 levels of Adventure mode — through day, night, fog, in a swimming pool, on the rooftop and more. Plus fend off a continual wave of zombies as long as you can with Survival mode!

NOT GARDEN-VARIETY GHOULS
Battle zombie pole-vaulters, snorkelers, bucketheads and 26 more fun-dead zombies. Each has its own special skills, so you'll need to think fast and plant faster to combat them all.
Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement.

Be careful how you use your limited supply of greens and seeds. Zombies love brains so much they'll jump, run, dance, swim and even eat plants to get into your house. Open the Almanac to learn more about all the zombies and plants to help plan your strategy.

FIGHT LONGER, GET STRONGER
Earn 49 powerful perennials as you progress and collect coins to buy a pet snail, power-ups and more.

description: Free Fire - Battlegrounds is the ultimate survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 50 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in trenches, or become invisible by proning under grass. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive.[Form guilds]Form the strongest guild and let it rip on the battlegrounds![Battlegrounds in its original form]Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Along the way, go for airdrops while avoiding airstrikes to gain that little edge against other players.[10 minutes, 50 players, epic survival goodness awaits]Within 10 minutes, a new survivor will emerge. Will it be you?[4-man squad, with in-game voice chat]Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad at the very first moment. Command your friends to victory and be the last team standing.[Realistic and smooth graphics]Easy to use controls and smooth graphics promises the best survival experience you will find on mobile.[Contact us]Facebook: https://facebook.com/freefireEN

comments: This is an extremely fun game. O have a few suggestions on how to fix things on the game. I noticed three things while playing this game. 1. There is not a continue playing option. This can easily be fixed and with all of the great work from Dvloper I think that this is not too far away. 2. I noticed you can uncrouch in the tunnel in the basement even though you are not all the way through. 3. Everything is in a certain place. If one object is in a certain place then if you are familiar with the game enough you will know where the other objects are. To be honest this is not a minor concern but still could be fixed. Other than that I can't stop playing! Thank you so much!!

It's really really really fun game.  But I think if you guys do some more improvements so it will be much fun.  Here's what I think:  1. I think you should make the house much bigger.  2. You should add more enemies for example:  child o' slenderina,  slenderman and the spiders.  3. You should add an Adventure mode.  Where you need to find some books or something like an emblem like that stuff to make them uncursed like that.  4. Last but not least, you should add more weapons for example:  Pistol,  sword,  injection etc.    If you do that,  it will be super cool and fun.   ThanQ üòÉüëç

It's definatly one of the better (more fun) horror games on the store, but I feel like there could be some more improvements. Firstly I think that if you've completed hard than there should be an (almost) impossible mode. Also minor details such as different textures and Easter eggs would be good. Last, I think that when you escape there should be an outside section where it's still got puzzles but it's more about the atmosphere. (Maybe that could just be for the "impossible mode") but it would make the game a lot more enjoyable. Also maybe a reward for escaping. (For incentive). Thank you and maybe you could take this into consideration :) also new app icon plz

Who doesn't love this game? It's bone chilling and exciting for the whole family (Litterally my whole fam plays this game) it would be cool to have a mode where there was no granny just to explore the house and get a feel for how to escape. Also some weapons to attack granny. Lastly a map of where granny is would be super cool. Good luck!

I love this game but please fix these: 1)Things in the same place when you die 2)The house is bigger 3)Show like a heart beat when Granny is near and not just foot step's. 4) A animal would be cool to help you around the house. 5)More weapons such as, Guns, Knifes, Ect. Lastly that when Granny steps on the bear traps she can get court to and maybe a Granddad! Other then that, This game is amazing and I can't stop playing and be glad to know my hole school is playing it and you hear it every turn you make! Not a joke! Keep it up!  =D

This is an early game with a bunch of potential. I love the game and I'm always playing it but I feel like you can expand the game with these additions. Firstly, why not add in a collectible menu where you can hunt extremely hard-to-find collection of items within Granny's house. Also you could possibly add another, backdoor exit to the house. This would mean being able to escape a different way. Finally you could add another whole game mode where you escape the house in a different way. (You could even add in a whole new mechanic but don't make it too complex!)

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Granny.

Granny keeps you locked in her house.
Now you have to try to get out of her house, but be careful and quiet. She hears everything.
If you drop something on the floor, she hears it and comes running.
You can hide in wardrobes or under beds.
You have 5 days.

Good luck!

The game contains advertisement.

* Now you can drop items on beartraps to disarm them.
summary: Granny keeps you locked in her house.
title: Granny

descriptionHTML:
Join the BEST WATER FIGHT of your life! Pack your water balloons. Grab your water guns. Get ready for the mission and get your opponents soaking wet! Plan a sneaky attack and collect the other team’s Coins and Energy. Use them to BUILD AN UNBEATABLE CAMP! And upgrade your Camp as fast as you can to get cool water weapons before your enemies!

Play this brand new, cool water fighting battle builder game – it’s amazing fun!

★★★HOW TO BE THE BEST★★★

★ BUILD YOUR CAMP
Construct an unbeatable Camp. Be quick and set it up before the other teams see you. Set up your Troop Shop, Hero Hall, Tower, Coin Factory, Energy Generator, and more. Level up your Minivan and the buildings in your Camp to get the best weapons and the most Energy to beat the other teams.

★ DEFEND & PLAN ATTACKS
Set up defenses like the Sprinkler, Tower, Puddle, Catapult, Cannon, and more. Protect your Troops, your Camp, and your Coins while you plan a unique water fight strategy! Build up your Troops and lead them to glory! Make the invaders run away!

★ WIN THE WATER FIGHT!
Grab your Water Gun, Slingshooter, Wingsuits, and other weapons. Use the right tactics and head straight into the action! Test your skills and train yourself to perfection in the SINGLE PLAYER Campaign episodes. Attack your enemies and fight in the mega MULTIPLAYER online battles. Progress through the levels and join your Troops with those of other players. That way you can play in even bigger battles! These serious fights are serious fun!

★ COLLECT GOLD & ENERGY
Win the most exciting water battle of the summer and level up! Collect Coins and Energy from other online players and use them to upgrade your Camp. Get your opponents' resources before they get yours or… Sneak behind enemy lines and steal them!

Hurry up! Join kids and adults all over the world and WIN THE WATER FIGHT in this amazing battle builder game with incredible design!

Talking Tom Camp is a free game with the option to purchase items to help you progress through the levels faster.

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and third party advertising
- Links that direct users to other apps and Outfit7's websites
- Personalization of content to entice users to play the app again
- The possibility to use and connect with friends via social networks and to use in-app chat
- The option to make in-app purchases
- Items are available for different prices in virtual currency, depending on the current level reached by the player
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchase using real money (level progress, games, in-game functionalities, ads)

Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/
Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/
Customer Support: support@outfit7.com

descriptionHTML:
AIM and SHOOT! Download now for FREE one of the best fps shooting games!
Start the killing: FIGHT the global war on crime and become the ULTIMATE SHOOTER.

Get yourself a gun and start shooting, clash with the criminals!

Sniper 3D Assassin® in 7 words: great gameplay, awesome visuals and entertaining missions. And best of all? It's a free fps game to pass the time! Defend the victims from kidnappings to bomb attacks, hostage survival is critical!

- Ultra REALISTIC 3D graphics and cool animations
- HUNDREDS of thrilling MISSIONS
- Tons of letal GUNS and mortal WEAPONS
- ADDICTING gameplay (FPS)
- EASY and INTUITIVE controls
- FREE game: play it both on your phone and tablet

DOWNLOAD the app for FREE now and don't miss amazing NEW CONTENT on periodic UPDATES. If you like fighting games, you will love the cool Sniper 3D game! Take down the bad guy from his fantasy, and get the glory for saving the victim. The final word is with you, and the rules are clear: aim and shoot!

Forget those dumb, repetitive shooting games. Here, your duty will include racing against time, exploding helicopters in American cities, killing zombies and quite a few shots in slow motion. Survival is necessary! But can you solve the puzzle, save the victims and kill only the right target hidden in the crowd? Can you stop the virus from spreading? You received the call for duty of saving the people.

Read what millions of extremely happy players have say about Sniper 3D. Check out our reviews!

Sniper 3D Assassin® is brought to you by Fun Games For Free.

The best first person shooter (fps) action game! Be the best professional sniper in every environment! The combat is real, and you can be the hero.

● Hundreds of mission:
"Alpha, Bravo, Charlie, do you copy?" Find the target, aim, shoot.
Save the state secrets from the rogue agents and spies, and stop them from spreading a terrible virus. Do you have the skills? Help your country in the massive nuclear competition. Be accurate and save the hostages and victims of the enemy.

● Start racing to kill a zombie army and prevent global war and destruction. Don't leave any zombie alive: start to shoot and kill them all! Are you prepared to all the action and adventure in this awesome fps shooting game? Can you guarantee the survival of the human race?

● Unlock awesome weapons and upgrade them with evolutions in the arsenal:
Buy the best Sniper rifles, assault rifles, shotguns or Pistols that exist with the gem you earn in the game! Upgrade the ammo, the grip, the calibre to get bullets that inflict more damage, better range, scope, stability, or zoom. Will you choose the hunting rifle, the awesome assault mp5 or a gun Glock or colt in the armory?

● Play it anywhere
Sniper 3D does not require you to be always online in order to have fun. You can enjoy it offline in the subway, while flying on a (real) plane, in the car on the road, during services in a temple (or maybe even on toilet!). From time to time, it may be necessary to download additional (free) content online.

● PvP mode
Try out the pvp mode: prepare your gun and hunt your enemy. You should kill him first. The pvp mode will test your speed in killing and hunting. Take long and you will be dead. Get into action now and enjoy the adventure in this top shooting game! Follow the rules of your training and act!

● Limited data usage
Our game will not consume tons of data from your mobile plan that you'd want to use instead to surf the web, watch youtube videos and listen to free music. Have fun with limited data usage.

● Disclaimer
Sniper 3D Assassin® is a free game but it contains mature content and optional in-app purchases for real money. You may want to keep away it from your kids and younger boys

descriptionHTML:
From the producers of Racing Fever comes a brand new motor racing experience!

In this game, we have blended all the adrenalin, fun and excitement a pair of tires can offer together for you. With the amazing racing experience and breathtaking graphics, you won’t be able to put your phone down.

4 different camera angles
For a more realistic experience, you may play from your racer’s viewpoint or increase your control on the race using different camera angles.

Realistically modeled motorcycles
We have modeled 16 different motorcycles down to the smallest detail for you. Take your pick, improve its performance, alter its design and start racing.

A racing adventure with 4 different gang leaders and tens of levels
4 different regions and 4 ruthless gang leaders! Tens of different racing types in different seasons in an amazing atmosphere await you. Defeat all 4 leaders to prove that you are the best racer!

4 different control options
We know that no two racers are alike! We included a control option to satisfy you all. Control your bike by tilting your phone or by touching the screen. You have no excuses left to win the race!

Support in 23 different languages
Don’t worry, we understand and speak the same language as you!

Escape Mode
In this game, speed limits were set to be broken! Remember that when running from the cops, it is just you and your bike!

Daily Bonus Mode
We didn't forget to add a mode where you can race daily to win valuable gifts!

Private Mode
You get to set the time of day, weather conditions, traffic density, speed and flow and even the number of cops! You set the rules, you win the race!

Please don’t forget to get in touch with us with your feedback and suggestions!

description: Enjoy this exciting Pinoy card game called Tongits. TongitsXtreme is played offline and is absolutely free! In this app version of the game of Tongits, you play against 2 computer players. The Artificial Intelligence (AI) engines could be average or a hustler, a conservative or an aggressive player! They will challenge your analytical skills to the point of driving you to madness, leaving you in amazement of how brilliant they are.GAME FEATURES:- User Experience feels like the real thing.- Intelligent opponents with multiple AI personalities- Multiple levels. Lower levels are easier. Get past level 7 to unlock more brilliant AIs.- You don't like cards dealt to you? No problem; just re-deal. (Only available in Level 7++).- Detailed Payment Scheme to guide you how much you are winning (or lossing).- Select your card back design- Interactive Messages to guide you throughout the game- Tokens and flags to remind player of previous round winner, last player to pick card from stack, and jackpot winner- Player's Money, Level, Rounds played, etc. backed-up even if App is updated - Swipe on the dumped card stack to see all the dumped cards- You don't have to remember how many cards are left on the deck; remaining card count is displayed on top of the deck.GOAL:Tong-its is a 3 player card game developed in the Northern Philippines. Your goal is to reduce the total value of your hand on your turn. You will win if you have done one of the ff : a) Eliminated all your cards ("Tong-its!") b) The lowest hand value at the end of the roundc) The lowest hand value in a Draw/FightTo reduce your hand value: a) Form and Post at least 1 Made b) Attach card/s to the Posted Mades Jackpot is won if you win two consecutive rounds.GAME FLOW:The round starts with the deal ‚Äì 13 cards for the starting player/previous round winner and 12 cards for the other 2.If it‚Äôs your turn:-Start by picking from the Stack or the latest Dumped Card-Post the Made created if you picked the latest Dumped Card-You may or may not Post the other Made/s in your hand-Attach card/s to Posted Made/s-End your turn by Dumping a CardYou can initiate a ‚ÄúDraw‚Äù before picking from the Stack or Dumped Card if:-You have Posted at least 1 Made-No card was attached to your Posted Made/s from your previous turn to your current turnEnjoy!
descriptionHTML:
Enjoy this exciting Pinoy card game called Tongits. TongitsXtreme is played offline and is absolutely free!


In this app version of the game of Tongits, you play against 2 computer players. The Artificial Intelligence (AI) engines could be average or a hustler, a conservative or an aggressive player! They will challenge your analytical skills to the point of driving you to madness, leaving you in amazement of how brilliant they are.


GAME FEATURES:
- User Experience feels like the real thing.
- Intelligent opponents with multiple AI personalities
- Multiple levels. Lower levels are easier. Get past level 7 to unlock more brilliant AIs.
- You don't like cards dealt to you? No problem; just re-deal. (Only available in Level 7++).
- Detailed Payment Scheme to guide you how much you are winning (or lossing).
- Select your card back design
- Interactive Messages to guide you throughout the game
- Tokens and flags to remind player of previous round winner, last player to pick card from stack, and jackpot winner
- Player's Money, Level, Rounds played, etc. backed-up even if App is updated
- Swipe on the dumped card stack to see all the dumped cards
- You don't have to remember how many cards are left on the deck; remaining card count is displayed on top of the deck.


GOAL:
Tong-its is a 3 player card game developed in the Northern Philippines. Your goal is to reduce the total value of your hand on your turn. You will win if you have done one of the ff :
a) Eliminated all your cards ("Tong-its!")
b) The lowest hand value at the end of the round
c) The lowest hand value in a Draw/Fight

To reduce your hand value:
a) Form and Post at least 1 Made
b) Attach card/s to the Posted Mades

Jackpot is won if you win two consecutive rounds.


GAME FLOW:
The round starts with the deal – 13 cards for the starting player/previous round winner and 12 cards for the other 2.

If it’s your turn:
-Start by picking from the Stack or the latest Dumped Card
-Post the Made created if you picked the latest Dumped Card
-You may or may not Post the other Made/s in your hand
-Attach card/s to Posted Made/s
-End your turn by Dumping a Card

You can initiate a “Draw” before picking from the Stack or Dumped Card if:
-You have Posted at least 1 Made
-No card was attached to your Posted Made/s from your previous turn to your current turn

Enjoy!
summary: Enjoy this exciting Pinoy card game called Tongits. Play free, play offline!
title: TongitsXtreme

comments: So, what makes this one of the best games made?  Let me start by saying the game play is fun.  Try to get the top medal each round. The game on its own is smooth and simple.  Graphic and physics are decent as well. But what makes this the best game?  Ads are not intrusive. You can simply back out of them without the "wait 30 seconds to continue."  I've actually watched ads in this game since they aren't forced. I keep them up because I wanted to.  This does not mean they aren't there or have little countdown timers, but you can simply hit the back button to close it. Next, you don't deal with "you didn't get a perfect score, want to try again? Buy more lives."  Exactly. NO IN APP PURCHASES. None!  Thank you!  Keep playing until your heart is content. Lose all you want and retry. They aren't looking for your money. Trust me, try it and you'll see. You also may find yourself more interested in the ads. I know it surprised me that I was. Every developer can learn from them!
Fun playing. Passes some idle time. Habit forming. How much more do I need to say before get something free? Lol...

comments: I used to play this game a long time ago with my brother. I thought since after all these years so many new updates have come, the game must feel different. But it's the same. I love the tune that plays as you play it. It's so nostalgic. My brother isn't anymore with me but playing this game makes me really very happy. It's just like I am back in those old days. Specially for me, as it has so many memories, this game is the absolute best.

I have a problem with my account. My punk zombird was maxed out. Level 3. Then when I opened the game, my punk zombird was gone... I obtained that by waiting patiently and gathering 90 diamonds. I had to watch 3 15-30 sec long video for 2 diamonds each. After watching the 3 vids, I had to wait another 8 hours for it to be available again. It took me a month to obtain that bird and then all of a sudden it dissapears?! I obtained it again but I had to start all over again. I uninstalled this app because of that issue.

The game is really addictive. but repeated zombie birds are generated and diamonds are getting wasted. Please change that. One bird one time please. One bird should be at max 3 level not another set. It's wasting my internet to watch video to get diamonds for collecting birds

I personally loved this game. First off,  u cant jump for high periods of time cause u to run into the bombs. Secondly, whats sup with these prices? Thats ridiculous. You cant level up with prices that high and u have to buy üíé gems and coins just to get a level up... But tum... Very great game overall.

I was confident to delete the app from my phone cos it says that the game will be saved on my fb acc. But only the highest score remained and the potion got back to 1. I was already at 56! Deym! Ayusin nyo buhay nyo! Sayang effort ko! Aba!

I love this game cause it kills our time when were bored. Yep, we, my mom also is addicted to this game hahaha, shes always getting my phone and play this game whenever im sleeping. Love it, I recommend this game to everyoneüíñ you'll be definitely love this game. MobiGame you slaaaay hahaha

comments: So I think just about everyone has heard of this game... Buuuuuuut there are some newbies here so I'll explain. Its a multiplayer game and It's in my opinion that It is probibly #2 best game I've ever played. Great concept and I like to get creative on makeing a snake/worm thing. A+ grade. üëåüëç

The controls are more difficult than the last time I played this game, which was a year or so ago. The new customization is very cool üëå but the fact that even the joystick (my usual preference) doesn't make it better at controlling. I don't know whether it is because of my phone or if it is in the app. Nevertheless good job, game is very addictive, keep up the good work üëå

this game is a thousand times better than agar.io in my opinion! It's so much easier to get onto the leader board. Every time I play I get onto the leader board. It's just so addicting and I can't get enough. Everyone in my family loves it too. Creating your own skin is a great option as well. My only complaint is that the 'play online' option is very laggy, and if you fix it would be much appreciated. Thanks for a great game, from sin√©ad, ella, lauren, mollie, shane and ollie üòäüòä

Should allow us to be able to control the speed with a bar level instead of the button. Should make online controllers like offlines. Faster and more sensitive to move. And add a special rare star that floats around the screen rarely that doubles your size by eating it. No matter how big you are. That would be interesting.

Playing this game is total fun. But It would be more Awesome if there will be some sounds & a pause button maybe. One more thing, somebody tell me how to BOOST the Slither because everyone is boosting except meüò≠üòåüò∂üôÑüòìüòëüò´üôÉ

In fact the lag is such an issue however, the game is getting uninstalled. You can't play a reaction based game when the lag has you 6 seconds behind whats going on.
description: Play against other people online! Can you become the longest slither?If your head touches another player, you will explode and then it's game over. But if others run into YOU, then THEY will explode, and you can eat their remains!In slither.io, you have a chance to win even if you're tiny. You can swerve in front of a much larger player to defeat them, no matter how big you are!Download now and start slithering! Good luck!
descriptionHTML:
Play against other people online! Can you become the longest slither?

If your head touches another player, you will explode and then it's game over. But if others run into YOU, then THEY will explode, and you can eat their remains!

In slither.io, you have a chance to win even if you're tiny. You can swerve in front of a much larger player to defeat them, no matter how big you are!

Download now and start slithering! Good luck!

descriptionHTML:
Candy Legend is a funny and lovely match-2 game. It`s completely free.

Candy Legend is easy to play, but it is plenty of fun and surprise.

How to play - Just tap on the same color blocks to crush them. Tap on 5 more blocks to generate a new candy which has a special skill!

There is a nice booster system, which supports you to solve any problem you meet in the game. By the way, the booster is also free.

One more thing, you can play the game at anywhere anytime，internet is not necessary for it.

Game features:
1. Be friendly to ladies
2. Completely free
3. Easy to play but very interesting
4. Wonderful gaming experience
5. 900+ levels
summary: Candy Legend is a funny and lovely match-2 game. It`s completely free.
title: Candy Legend

Dislikes -  1) It's also a game of money so....  2) When you win too many games       you get tougher opponents.  3) Despite having good Internet      connection the game disrupts in      between by disconnecting it.  4) The game starts controlling you        in winning or losing.

I realize y'all gotta get paid but why make the playing experience for those of us that don't pay cash money. Instead I seem to get strange lock ups or no response from game. I always seem to lose 100s of thousands. It's a pretty good app and I've sent many people to download your app.

description: ** Over 5 Million Downloads! **Philippine Slam! brings the fun of 2v2, full-court basketball to your mobile devices. This zany and quirky arcade-style basketball features ridiculous antics, high-flying dunks, and witty commentary that will keep you at the end of your seats. It‚Äôs basketball striped down to its most fun and basic components which makes it easy to pick-up and enjoy.Based from the players and teams of the Philippine Basketball Association, you can choose from real teams and players with real stats and abilities. Play against different AI difficulties, beat different campaigns, and even play with a custom player using your own picture as a face!FACTSThe Philippine Basketball Association is the first professional basketball league in Asia and is the second oldest continuously existing in the world after the NBA.Philippines men's national team popularly known as Gilas Pilipinas is consist mostly of Philippine Basketball Associaton players and the Philippines was awarded the Most Valuable Fan (MVF) Best Country Award during the recent 2014 FIBA World Cup.FEATURES* 2 vs 2 full court hoops game* Create your own player and join your favorite team!* Funny Taglish (Tagalog/English) game commentator* Compete for the All Filipino, Governors Cup and Commisioners Cup Championship!* Collect Trophies on ALL TEAMS!* Action packed and exaggerated gameplay.* Jam the hoops with amazing slam dunks!* Get ELECTRIFIED and do high flying dunks!* No Fouls* Play as one of the current Philippine Basketball Association teams.** Barangay Ginebra** Alaska Aces** Magnolia Hotshots** San Miguel Beermen** Tropang TNT** Rain or Shine Elasto Painters** Meralco Bolts** NLEX Road Warriors** Phoenix Fuel Masters** Global Port Batang Pier** KIA Picanto** Blackwater EliteGuest Teams:* Gilas Pilipinas* 2017 All Star Luzon* 2017 All Star Visayas* 2017 All Star MindanaoPERMISSIONS* READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: permissions for selecting photos when creating a player* WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: permissions for saving edited photos for custom player* CAMERA: permissions for taking photos* READ_PHONE_STATE: permissions for user statisticsWe will continue to work and update the game with new rosters and more awesome features.Like our facebook page to get updates and join contestfb.com/pbaslamgameAnd visit our websites at:www.philippineslam.comwww.ranidagames.comFor comments and suggestions you can email us atinfo[at]ranidagames.com
descriptionHTML:
** Over 5 Million Downloads! **

Philippine Slam! brings the fun of 2v2, full-court basketball to your mobile devices. This zany and quirky arcade-style basketball features ridiculous antics, high-flying dunks, and witty commentary that will keep you at the end of your seats. It’s basketball striped down to its most fun and basic components which makes it easy to pick-up and enjoy.

Based from the players and teams of the Philippine Basketball Association, you can choose from real teams and players with real stats and abilities. Play against different AI difficulties, beat different campaigns, and even play with a custom player using your own picture as a face!

FACTS
The Philippine Basketball Association is the first professional basketball league in Asia and is the second oldest continuously existing in the world after the NBA.

Philippines men's national team popularly known as Gilas Pilipinas is consist mostly of Philippine Basketball Associaton players and the Philippines was awarded the Most Valuable Fan (MVF) Best Country Award during the recent 2014 FIBA World Cup.

FEATURES
* 2 vs 2 full court hoops game
* Create your own player and join your favorite team!
* Funny Taglish (Tagalog/English) game commentator
* Compete for the All Filipino, Governors Cup and Commisioners Cup Championship!
* Collect Trophies on ALL TEAMS!
* Action packed and exaggerated gameplay.
* Jam the hoops with amazing slam dunks!
* Get ELECTRIFIED and do high flying dunks!
* No Fouls
* Play as one of the current Philippine Basketball Association teams.

** Barangay Ginebra
** Alaska Aces
** Magnolia Hotshots
** San Miguel Beermen
** Tropang TNT
** Rain or Shine Elasto Painters
** Meralco Bolts
** NLEX Road Warriors
** Phoenix Fuel Masters
** Global Port Batang Pier
** KIA Picanto
** Blackwater Elite

Guest Teams:

* Gilas Pilipinas
* 2017 All Star Luzon

comments: This game is great except, the fact that everytime I play now it won't allow me to finish even one match. It freezes the controls and eventually my phone after player 2 is done with their turn and I begin mine. Fix this big and I will gladly give 5 stars. This game deserves it.

Cool looking game played like 15 matches. Annndd then it started freezing. In a single player match i would fire 2 shots and the my entire phone would stop and the only way to get out is to close the app. Im using a galaxy j7

comments: I think it would be better if you got more gems. You can barely win anything on that little slot machine. I also noticed that you no longer get gems for every day you log in to play. Sure, the money is nice but you can't upgrade with just the money you earn while playing. I spun that slot machine 80 plus spins and barely won anything. Do the gems even pop up as a winning combo? They used to but not anymore.

I like the mobile version better than the PC version because the touch screen works better than the mouse. I also love the food machine you can get for 12 diamonds. It's pricey but we'll worth the purchase. I kinda wish the pace of customers was a little bit slower so I had more time to prepare the food. I do wish however that I didn't need so many gems to upgrade every little thing. Or if I do need gems then maybe they could be easier to get instead of only getting 5 every time you level up. So, decrease the pace of customers and make the gems easier to get

This game is an amazing way to pass the time! I love all the upgrades and different levels, especially the events. The game gets more challenging as you go along, and the events I previoisly mentioned make it just that much better. My only complaint is how hard it is to get the special currency of the game, being diamonds. Other than that, it is a great game overall and I am looking forward to future updates.

I loved the game but after the first restaurant you need gems to upgrade things regularly and they do not come around often after the first restaurant. All the achievements are money based. Money is easy to come by and I have only won on the casino once and all the fun is lost grinding to make money to spend on the slot machine to try and get gems. I'm on the second restaurant and I'm bored of waiting for gems to upgrade now.

I Love Everything About This Game. I Can Upgrade Everything and Get Far. I Save Soooooo Much Money And I Can Learn Quickly How To Cook & Level Up Very Fast. Before I Switched Over To A New Phone Plan I Realized A Very Awesome Little Technique They Have. If You Have A Connected Account No Matter What Phone You Get Your Levels Will Be Stored & Saved. I Was So Shocked. Overall I Love This Game. Most Definitely Will Recommend.

They should call the game Cooking Fever Lite just because that is honestly what you get with this game. Fun and addictive in the beginning, but eventually you realize the grind for gems has low yield and is largely chance based, and the rate of growth for your restaurants significantly lessens. It drains the appeal if you're looking for a fun freebie.

comments: So I am a major mobile gamer.  And I must say this game is awesome in a number of ways. My cons however is: arena battles are way too long.     : more clarification should be emphasize on "finish daily or unfurnished daily", I can't seem to understand when my daily is completed by looking at the daily chart.  : too much pay to play going on. Mix it up a little plz.   Pros. Great story line.            Epic fighting styles.             Awesome mounts.             Super clean graphics.              Will keep u entertained.

Its a good game. One of the nicest mmorpg on the market right now. However, my only nitpick is the lack of customization of the characters. You get new armor but your actual appearance doesn't change except with outfits, but everyone has those so at the end of the day your character does not feel unique at all. The combat and navigation are on point though. Overall a good game but just lack of personal input.

Nice game. But player's cant level up more. I get vip for this game but it sucks! So hard to level up what's wrong with you guys. How players will enjoy this game! No A.P and lots of problem so when the players no gems to buy your AP we exit. What will you do guys. When the players are gone? You will revise the game play to get more exp. Try it then you will see guys no more players in this game! Fix it not for me! For use who play this game and I think many players will enjoy in haunting items level up and more vip players will come. Hope to read this guys!

i could have give 5 star on this game if only the supports are replying on my email. the game is great but not player friendly. i emailed so many times on ingame support but no reply till now. if you would mind to check, some asian server doesn't have timed event tab. players who recharge and consume their diamonds didn't get any corresponding rewards. please check server a-s101 for your information thanks.

This is actually a very good mmorpg game, i'd like to say it's the best mmorpg, but, the bug isn't fixed yet, i can't see my character when playin, also the puppeter and bountu hunter. Fix this bug quickly, i want to play this game so bad. I can't enjoy the gameplay if the characters are invisible.

Nice Graphic. But won't last long playing this game. Takes too much time to level up and why can't I play some event alone by myself and must join with 2 or 3 other player ?   Character us nice but not much changes so it doesn't make My character special at all. It's just like a place full of character with the same parents running around. Hopefully can make some updates. Don't waste the effort onto the graphic and end up not a lasting game to play with.

game is fun but make original voices for attack like catapult archers fireballs and killing, i hate the same aaaa aaaaaa aeeeeaaaa voices of enemy during dying and please make the game less pixalated

description: Game of Warriors is a Strategy TD (Tower Defense) game with a unique style in its genre. Set in a magical world you will have to upgrade your defenses and mighty soldiers to survive and siege enemy territories to conquer them.The rival alliance of the evil kingdoms has pushed what remains of the human civilization to a corner of the world, isolated and forgotten, plunged into misery and trying to survive harshly.Ready the horses, hire your warriors and prepare the spears for battle, the war horn will sound again and our titans will destroy the enemy walls and towers.The age of dark empires have come to an end, it's time to recover what rightfully belongs to us, it's time for revolt, war and revenge!The warriors claim your name, lord!Command your gladiators into a battle for eternal glory in this epic clash of warriors.Features:-  Tower Defense (TD) and Strategy game style.-  +1500 defensive waves.-  4 Heroes to unlock.-  +100 territories to conquer.-  +30 soldiers to upgrade.-  +1000 building upgrades.-  4 different races to conquer (Goblins, Skeletons, Worgens and Orcs).-  15 passive and 3 active skills for your general.
descriptionHTML:
Game of Warriors is a Strategy TD (Tower Defense) game with a unique style in its genre. Set in a magical world you will have to upgrade your defenses and mighty soldiers to survive and siege enemy territories to conquer them.

The rival alliance of the evil kingdoms has pushed what remains of the human civilization to a corner of the world, isolated and forgotten, plunged into misery and trying to survive harshly.

Ready the horses, hire your warriors and prepare the spears for battle, the war horn will sound again and our titans will destroy the enemy walls and towers.

The age of dark empires have come to an end, it's time to recover what rightfully belongs to us, it's time for revolt, war and revenge!

The warriors claim your name, lord!

Command your gladiators into a battle for eternal glory in this epic clash of warriors.

Features:

- Tower Defense (TD) and Strategy game style.
- +1500 defensive waves.
- 4 Heroes to unlock.
- +100 territories to conquer.
- +30 soldiers to upgrade.
- +1000 building upgrades.
- 4 different races to conquer (Goblins, Skeletons, Worgens and Orcs).
- 15 passive and 3 active skills for your general.

update I wonder why game app like R.O.S and this moba AOV need a huge update. Please make this game using abit amount of size from before & please make game more balance. Player with low connection please dont make them didn't join any rank match or what.. they always make our game really bad

Better than ML. Honestly, I play all sorts of Moba (or any video game), but this one really is different.  This game has issues, no argument with that. But when you compare it to "Mobile Legends: Bang Bang", you really see the difference. This one has top-notch graphics that I can probably compare to VG or PC Mobas. This game has awesome gameplay as well. There are almost overpowered heroes, but there are always heroes that counter them. ML looks like sht compared to this game.  The only downside that I can see is that, the controls are kinda off. Probably with an update, they can fix that. Will give five stars once that happens.

comments: Great game with fun objectives that keep it challenging until level 15.  Only issue with it is that ive recently lost all.my gems due to some sort of bug and now i dont really want to continue playing just to get back to 500 gems to experience something other than sky summit.

comments: This is by far the best chess "trainer" for me.  It's got a nice flow and the game isn't "stupid" like most other chess apps/games I've played.  I plat at least a few games every night and I feel like it give me a nice challenge and makes me really think about the moves I'm making.  Especially at the higher difficulty levels.  Overall a great chess app with no glitches and a good brain inside of it.  A must for a chess player with any real skill at the game.

I really was worried it would be too easy or too tough. tho I am not a master, yet, I know my way around the board.  I realized it has been making me a spectacular player ..the computer does not just do the same dumb moves over and over its almost like its stalking me like prey around the board! ha great game!!!-!!

I love this game and the best brain exerciser game ever in the history.  The cool 3d view makes the game as if I am playing on the real board, very good graphics. However, it doesn't show the list of killed chessman during game play the only drawback. I am expecting this upgradation and this will be the perfect Android chess.

Simply Amazing Graphics. Gives real chess game feel. Great work developers!!! Pls make rules column in settings for beginners. I wonder why people call this a bad game if they can't complete levels. You need to try harder.. I Reached middle level in 6 games, It was a good game..

So far it's o.k. I like the fact that it is simply a chess game with no fancy sound effects or graphics. I see no real reason to have the higher difficulty levels locked out until they are beaten but they are. I got it to practice with. It is useful for that. It's not bad...Just a simple down to earth chess game

The game has been drawn because the other player has no legal move and is not in check. If they can ot move then I win because they cannot move to a legal position. The computer ends the games too early because they cannot be bothered to chase you around the board. You cannot unlock the higher difficulty games because it just says draw.
description: Chess in your AndroidChess is a board game for two players. It is played on a square board, made of 64 smaller squares, with eight squares on each side. Each player starts with sixteen pieces: eight pawns, two knights, two bishops, two rooks, one queen and one king. The goal of the game is for each player to try and checkmate the king of the opponent. Checkmate is a threat ('check') to the opposing king which no move can stop. It ends the game.During the game the two opponents take turns to move one of their pieces to a different square of the board. One player ('White') has pieces of a light color; the other player ('Black') has pieces of a dark color. There are rules about how pieces move, and about taking the opponent's pieces off the board. The player with white pieces always makes the first move. Because of this, White has a small advantage, and wins more often than Black in tournament games.Chess is popular and is often played in competitions called chess tournaments. It is enjoyed in many countries, and is a national hobby in Russia.Features:- five different themes- seven levels of difficulty- two players mode- game assistant (Helper)- realistic graphics- sound effects- small size
descriptionHTML:
Chess in your Android

Chess is a board game for two players. It is played on a square board, made of 64 smaller squares, with eight squares on each side. Each player starts with sixteen pieces: eight pawns, two knights, two bishops, two rooks, one queen and one king. The goal of the game is for each player to try and checkmate the king of the opponent. Checkmate is a threat ('check') to the opposing king which no move can stop. It ends the game.

During the game the two opponents take turns to move one of their pieces to a different square of the board. One player ('White') has pieces of a light color; the other player ('Black') has pieces of a dark color. There are rules about how pieces move, and about taking the opponent's pieces off the board. The player with white pieces always makes the first move. Because of this, White has a small advantage, and wins more often than Black in tournament games.

Chess is popular and is often played in competitions called chess tournaments. It is enjoyed in many countries, and is a national hobby in Russia.

Features:

- five different themes
- seven levels of difficulty
- two players mode
- game assistant (Helper)
- realistic graphics
- sound effects
- small size
summary: Chess is a board logic game with beautiful graphics and progressive levels
title: Chess

comments: I love playing talking angela so much, Its super fun and I love opening new packs of stickers! Also the graphics in the game are great. Although my only problem is that theres SO ads like a lot, also the outfits and make-up is SOOO expensive and its sometimes hard to earn coins and diamonds. But overall its a fun game and is a real time waster.

This game is amazing! A real time waster and It's really fun! But it should really save to the cloud because I was on LVL 38 or something, I had everything, then I had to move to a new tablet and all of my game progress *poof* vanished!! Also, everything's a BIT expensive... Other than that, It's a really good game! Well done Outfit7 üòÑ‚ù§

This would totally be worth 5 stars if it weren't for the ADS. I get it's a free game, but its one thing to put an ad on the top or side of the screen. It's one thing to optionally watch ads for coins and prizes. But its another thing when full screen videos pop-up, pausing your game and wasting your time. I was honestly thinking about giving this 3 stars just b/c of how annoying that is alone.

This game has too many adds in it. Every minute an adds pops up and it ends up being a video for another game, so I have to wait  and watch  it until it's  done. Please fix this if you can. Over all it's  a really good game.

It's gd but when you watch a video I don't get the prize at the end and it's sooooo annoying. If got that fixed then would be 5 stars. That isn't put you off or anything it's a really good game I enjoy it a lot

Everything players have asked for is added. At a ridiculous price.  But if people are paying that's on them.   HOWEVER you shouldn't have to buy the adult /baby formula more than once. If you bought it you should be allowed to switch back and forth as you wish.    It's a really zen pass time  game :) also cute and interactive.

comments: Nice game at first, my gf got angry at some point because I played it the whole time. However, I soon started playing less and less, because winning just became impossible. I respect the developers, but I wont pay to max out a cars modifications just to race that same car which is twice as fast. How does that work? Are the AI cars getting modifications from a different game?

Game is fun until you get so far and can no longer upgrade to compete.  I have all stars in amateur league, yet on achievement rewards it shows I only have 1 star.  This is a problem to try to earn stars to purchase higher end cars, you can't without spending money.  Should be anle to earn all cars if you play regularly withput spending money.

Update: so I've been playing for several weeks now. You cannot win with maxed out mods, racing the same level cars. They're twice as fast and you can only knock off 3 cars at the beginning of the race and you're unable to catch with others. Even if you spend money, you will not get 1st place in a lot of the races. Very unbalanced game. Whoever programmed the ai should be fired  Fun game, but the intrusive ads are ridiculous. It pops up in the middle of a race, before and after the race, finished off by asking you to pay to remove ads.

It would br better if you could exchange coins for diamonds, not just diamonds for coins. I also have a screen shot which shows that I should be the 1 place, yet another car which was behind me and crossed the line 1 sec later got the first place :/

So many ad's, there back to back ad's. When I am finally able to select a race, guess what...another ad pops up and takes me to the play store to download it. I go back to the game and I gotta start all over again from the first screen. Ad's ad's ad's I was only able to play on the first day I downloaded it, after that..... Ad's ad's ad's                    "AD'S!!!".... But i did like the game when I played it

Good time waster. Especially well made in the beginning levels, but quickly becomes pay to win, as diamonds are not easily attainable and neither are coins, not to mention that later cars are very high prices and require much dedication to acquire. Controls are nice, but like with money, get worse with time. Maps are not optimized for later leveled cars, making some corners physically impossible to make even when drifting at full tilt, forcing the player to adapt to a combination of drifting, boosting and then braking to get around a bend without crashing. Otherwise, it is a very nice game for being free, although there are many ads, but that's excusable as it is a free game. I would recommend it, just not as a long term type of game.

The characters from TV animes BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS and NARUTO SHIPPUDEN are finally united in NARUTO X BORUTO!

a fusion of action and strategy!

--------------------------

--------------------------

All your favorite characters are joining the battle, including Naruto Uzumaki, Sasuke Uchiha, Kakashi Hatake, and Sakura Haruno from NARUTO SHIPPUDEN,

from BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS!

Simple controls that let you perform blazing fast combo attacks and all types of Ninjutsu!

Compete for Battle Rankings by attacking and protecting fortresses. Try to get the
highest ranking by competing with players from all over the country!

description: Transform your very own tropical island into a bustling metropolis beyond your wildest imagination! Transform your very own tropical island into a bustling metropolis beyond your wildest imagination! In this top-notch city management simulation, you'll work with the Mayor and his quirky cohorts to build it into the best paradise it can be.

DEVELOP YOUR DREAMS

• Choose your expansion style: industrial tycoon, technological prodigy, or cultural artisan.
• Visit your friends' cities to see the effects of different development strategies.
• Unlock unique landmarks and buildings: They'll produce diverse resources that keep your city appealing to new citizens.

ENJOY AN ENGAGING STORY

• Help the wacky Mayor make important decisions to achieve his goals successfully.
• Heed the advice of your advisors to navigate tricky scenarios.

EXPERIENCE A LIVELY CITY

• Handle spontaneous events impacted by the unique design of your city.
• Get breaking Daily News reports that recap your latest achievements.

Become the most creative tycoon the world has ever seen -- and the best builder, too!

comments: Love this game! I have been playing Gardenscapes for quite some time and I would see ads for this one. So I decided to try it. Now I am hooked! However, I wish it was like Matchington Mansions where you can go to other players mansions and if they have items that you don't have (furniture, flooring, wallpaper etc.) you can click on it and acquire it. Not sure if this game has that option because I am not that far along in the game. Other than that, it is FANTASTIC!!

I love decorating the rooms but I am having to pay too much to get enough points to do it.   I also don't like that each room requires more points to do the tasks than the previous room.  I have changed my rating to low because you end up spending too much of your own money to get powerful to get your stars to complete the tasks.  They also lose your purchases.  I bought a desk chair yesterday and now it is missing and the task is gone too.  Rip off.

Never thought it would be this addictive! At first i thought "Oh, its THAT game that always pops up in advertisements." but after deciding to give it a try, i am hooked!   I introduced homescapes to my mom as well and downloaded it for her and she finds it adorable and fun as well. We both take time to chill out and have fun with the puzzles occasionally when we are together.   I cant find a single flaw or critique for this game, its amazing :)

Everything is awesome. Love the gameplay, love the graphics and  etc. BUT please can ypu speed the "end stage" part?  I am talking about the part where you finished the stage and you start collecting the  coins.  Can you speed it up? Because watching my 7+ moves turn into airplanes or bombs and watch how they make more money is good but its taking too long.  Especially  when I have an infinite life's  for hour or so.  Can you make so that after you finish the stage it will simply fast forward to the end?  Thank you

It's a nice game alright - lovely graphics and a nice gameplay. But I can't help thinking that it was made for one single purpose - to pull money out of your pocket. The levels are too hard, the moves are never enough so you either have to give up and loose a life or pay for additional moves. Such a shame, I really liked it but I will have to delete it.

This game left me speechless at how incredibly fascinating it was. Some may say that it's just another candy crush saga, but this game is in a whole other league & is more than just matching colors. There is not a single defect in this game. Although, honestly speaking, at 1st it didn't look all that great in the ads I would see of it, but I thought since I continued to see it quite often that I'd give it a shot. I'm glad I did because this is one of the GREATEST Mobile games EVER MADE! For me it would easily be top 3 Hands down. I would strongly recommend this to any & everyone. I only wish I were able to grant this Marvelous game 6 Stars.
