description: In Asphalt 8, you‚Äôll race in some of the hottest, most high-performance dream machines ever created, from cars to bikes, taking them on a global tour of speed. From the blazing Nevada Desert to the tight turns of Tokyo, you‚Äôll find a world of challenge, excitement & arcade fun on your road to the top!REAL LUXURY DREAM CARS & MOTORCYCLES!‚Ä¢ Over 190 high-performance cars & bikes to drive & push beyond their limits.‚Ä¢ Top licensed manufacturers & models: the Lamborghini Veneno, Bugatti 16.4 Grand Sport Vitesse, Ferrari LaFerrari, McLaren P1, Porsche 911 GT3 RS, Ducati Monster 1200 & more, including a selection of racing motorbikes!‚Ä¢ Newly recorded high-fidelity motor sounds for realistic audio immersion.‚Ä¢ Customize & upgrade your rides with over 2,300 decals to take down opponents with style!GET AIRBORNE WITH ASPHALT 8‚Ä¢ Hit the ramps & take the race beyond the limits of physics, breaking free from gravity into the sky with a car or bike!‚Ä¢ Perform barrel rolls & wild 360¬∫ jumps to soar past your opponents.‚Ä¢ Maneuver through the air, pulling off insane stunts in your car or motorcycle to maximize your speed & find a fast route to the goal.EXOTIC NEW LOCATIONS‚Ä¢ Over 40 high-speed tracks in 16 different settings, such as Venice, French Guiana, Iceland, the Nevada Desert & other exciting locations to ride your car or bike across!‚Ä¢ Race any track you want in original mode or its mirror variation to ensure a fresh challenge in Career mode that‚Äôs sure to keep you on your toes.‚Ä¢ Discover plenty of shortcuts hidden throughout every location. REAL LUXURY DREAM CARS & MOTORCYCLES!
• Over 190 high-performance cars & bikes to drive & push beyond their limits.
• Top licensed manufacturers & models: the Lamborghini Veneno, Bugatti 16.4 Grand Sport Vitesse, Ferrari LaFerrari, McLaren P1, Porsche 911 GT3 RS, Ducati Monster 1200 & more, including a selection of racing motorbikes!
• Newly recorded high-fidelity motor sounds for realistic audio immersion.
• Customize & upgrade your rides with over 2,300 decals to take down opponents with style!

GET AIRBORNE WITH ASPHALT 8
• Hit the ramps & take the race beyond the limits of physics, breaking free from gravity into the sky with a car or bike!
• Perform barrel rolls & wild 360º jumps to soar past your opponents.
• Maneuver through the air, pulling off insane stunts in your car or motorcycle to maximize your speed & find a fast route to the goal.

EXOTIC NEW LOCATIONS
• Over 40 high-speed tracks in 16 different settings, such as Venice, French Guiana, Iceland, the Nevada Desert & other exciting locations to ride your car or bike across!
• Race any track you want in original mode or its mirror variation to ensure a fresh challenge in Career mode that’s sure to keep you on your toes.
• Discover plenty of shortcuts hidden throughout every location. Mastering them is sure to raise your game to the top of the competition!

AN ENDLESS STREAM OF CONTENT FOR SPEED FREAKS!
• 9 seasons & over 400 events in Career mode, with plenty of challenges for even the most experienced car & motorcycle riders.
• Stunning visuals thanks to next-gen shaders, real-time geometry reflection & other amazing HD effects.
• Check out the Infected & Gate Drift modes for a fresh twist on racing.
• Win top prizes in the Limited-Time Cups, including early access to some of the latest cars in the game!
• A detailed damage system.

THE ULTIMATE MULTIPLAYER RACING EXPERIENCE!
• Gear up for simultaneous multiplayer action for up to 8 real players!
• Multiplayer Seasons & Leagues! Race your best against other players to score points & unlock prizes in limited-time Racing Seasons.
• Dare friends to asynchronous races as you chase your rivals’ ghost cars & bikes across the track.
• Compare scores on the new leaderboards with friends & rival riders around the world.
• Share your racing achievements & prove that you’re the ultimate speed machine.

MUSIC TO REV YOUR SOUL
• A heart-thumping mix of amazing music licensed for Asphalt 8 to drive your need for fast arcade racing.

CONTROL CUSTOMIZATION
• Rearrange your on-screen icons & controls however you like to customize & optimize your style of play.

So, are you ready for a real HD stunt-racing experience? Can you handle the Ferrari, Mercedes, or Audi of your dreams, among dozens of high-octane motorcycles? Do you have an insatiable need for groundbreaking speed? Well, consider this your green light to go & download Asphalt 8, fast!

comments: Awesome game there's a lot of people saying this game lags it doesn't it a very relaxing and fun great job to the ones who made this game I never have problems with this game works great for me
Love this game

Well this game is better then most farming games i have played. The crops dont die is a major plus for me . The only thing i dont like is the wait time for things i think there to long at times. But other wise one of my fav games . Love the notification sounds there fun and i really enjoy the club that u can join find a good one like i did and u have a bunch of nice and helpful ppl. Would recommend playing this game and all the others tjis company makes

I've been on Township since 2015 and I absolutely love it. Its the first game I play in the morning and the last one I play at night. This game has so much personality. From the characters to the animals, it is by far the best game that I've played so far. Keeps me busy for hours and I recently got my boyfriend hooked, keeps him as busy as it does myself. I don't have any complaints about it. Thank you GPG for coming up with a game so super fantastic. Kudos to the developers.

This game needs the ability to gain more township cash. I have spent way too much real money to buy township cash and im not doing so again at this rate. Farmville isnt this bad and hard to expand.  You cant expand the barn without waiting on products by train or paying in township cash to expand. And that costs over a couple hundred township cash for each expansion. Getting a dollar or two here and there takes forever to collect. Plus the expansion makes small expansions so it doesnt help much.   If something dont change i may quit the game. I enjoy it and would like to continue but at this rate i dont see much point. I cant afford to pay more money to play.

The Best!  But not Great my suggestion is please add an option to chat your friends privately this is important!.  Also add an option to search anyone by their township name so we can easily adding them.. Last one add an option to change your profiles photo from our gallery if you can~ instead of using our Facebook photos or township original photos.. Please make it happen
description: Township is a unique blend of city-building and farming! Build your dream town! Harvest crops at the farms, process them at your facilities, and sell goods to develop your town. Trade with exotic countries. Open restaurants, cinemas, and other community buildings to give life in your town special flavor. Explore the mine to get resources and find ancient artifacts. Run your own zoo and collect animals from around the world.Are you ready to become a farmer and city-manager to build your dream? Let‚Äôs get started!Township features:‚óè Different buildings and decorations you can use to create your dream town‚óè Various crops to grow and later process at your factories‚óè Fun, charismatic townspeople with orders you need to fill‚óè Your town's mine packed with ancient artifacts to discover and collect‚óè Lovely animals to take care of‚óè Farms to manage and expand‚óè Exotic goods brought from islands‚óè A zoo to build where you can even breed animals‚óè Country flags and famous landmarks you can use to decorate your town, like the Statue of Liberty, Big Ben, and many more!‚óè Play with your Facebook and Google+ friends, make new friends in the game community create your own clans! Township is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.*Internet connection is required to play the game and enable social interactions, competitions and other features* Enjoying Township? descriptionHTML:
Township is a unique blend of city-building and farming!

Build your dream town! Harvest crops at the farms, process them at your facilities, and sell goods to develop your town. Trade with exotic countries. Open restaurants, cinemas, and other community buildings to give life in your town special flavor. Explore the mine to get resources and find ancient artifacts. Run your own zoo and collect animals from around the world.
Are you ready to become a farmer and city-manager to build your dream? Let’s get started!

Township features:
● Different buildings and decorations you can use to create your dream town
● Various crops to grow and later process at your factories
● Fun, charismatic townspeople with orders you need to fill
● Your town's mine packed with ancient artifacts to discover and collect
● Lovely animals to take care of
● Farms to manage and expand
● Exotic goods brought from islands
● A zoo to build where you can even breed animals
● Country flags and famous landmarks you can use to decorate your town, like the Statue of Liberty, Big Ben, and many more!
● Play with your Facebook and Google+ friends, make new friends in the game community create your own clans!

Township is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.

*Internet connection is required to play the game and enable social interactions, competitions and other features*

Enjoying Township? Learn more about the game!
Facebook: www.facebook.com/TownshipMobile
Twitter: twitter.com/township_mobile

Questions? Contact our Tech Support at support@playrix.com.

comments: Classic UNO with a couple of modern twists and turns. I have never spent any real money in a game and I don't ever plan to, but here you also don't really need to. I've won many tournaments and got really far in the game without buying anything. You get extra coins by winning and completing daily tasks, as well as watching ads. But you're not forced to watch them. It's not just about luck. You have to play smart to win, just like any other card game. I love it.

I enjoy this lifetime favorite with people worldwide, and Uno Dare is my most favorite mode. I understand it will be discontinued in June and I wish it wasn't so.    ...Hey Uno & Friends, could you please not ask me to rate an app I've already rated??? I was asked to read it again and then I came back to find I had made that specific request not to ask me to re-rate something. Your app needs to be reprogrammed so it knows if someone has rated it or not. (sigh)

Tokens take too long to refill. Level up gives a few coins, why not a token refill? Tournament champion gets 4 tokens. 7 tokens for a day? Cheapskates! When do you want us to play, every 5 days? So cheap in giving prizes, guessing you want us to buy eh? I'll give myself a few weeks playing this game and am out. No daily prize wheel, just a daily "less than 20 coins" reward. Sooooooo cheap!

It's just ok.  Hard to see your entire hand at times and some of the rules are different than the actual UNO game itself. When I contacted this apps tech support, they sounded as if they could care less and said they will not be making any changes to the game.  So I play until they want me to buy credits then I stop.  When they give me more free credits I play again.  I like the game UNO, just not this one so much.  Why do I still play?  Hmmm, that's a good question.

Greatest game ever~~¬§mean it.  The Updated game even better.  Need to be easier to play with Friends that you JUST made ~~maybe REPLAY!!!  üò¨ üò≤ üò† üòê üò≠  Friends where are you? Great for tablets.   I am UNO happy . Happy New years  .Oh don't terminate the game unless you just have to, I well try finding something other to do. Nothing Good ever lasts anyway.   Thanks for reading.  UNO POWER.

LOVE! Please DO NOT end the game! This app is perfect all the way around. Best card game app ever. SOOO many people are gonna be upset if you take it down, so leave it up! These uno players are ready to rock this app! You will never not have people playing. It would be kind of cool if you could create your own avatar though.. & pick outfits and such. Not necessary, but a fun little quirk (:

comments: I kind of miss the old version because isn't that why they came out with a 2nd game so if we eant more we got it.  Also, after I play each round therr is a ad and I wish I could just play not play waut gor 2 ads play ad play ad ad ad ad. On the plus side, I like how it has stickers and how you can make your own ean I think that factor is really cool and a way to interact with the game.

This game is both funny as serious it's a great way to make kids understand the danger of some things around them. Like trains and wires and different things. As funny and silly this app is it can be a bit gross. Like blood and organs and stuff. The more this game updates the better it gets keep those updates coming. GREAT game.

I played 3 years ago, then came back now, alot changed! I still love it! Though, when I'm playing the game with Botch, and I cover up the bullet holes, my phone only allows 2 fingers to touch at once, so I usually can't complete the daily challenges, so I think that we should have the option to disable that gameüëç
I think that there could be less ads. When I'm trying to replay he game an ad pops up which is really annoying. What I would say is that this is an excellent game but just less of the ads

A truly wonderful and entertaining game. Very well supported with great updates over the years. Latest version (Valentine's) appears to be buggy (animations jerk ahead) ruining the gameplay. I'm unsure it this is the game or my phone.

I like it a lot this game is so good but there is one thing that really bugs me.  There is way to many ads.  Every time I play a set of games to get a good score and I click play again or main menu or practice it gives me an ad.  This really bothers me please put less ads or at least do not make them quite as long.
description: You've seen the video - now the lives of those charmingly dumb characters are in your hands.Enjoy 52 hilarious mini-games as you attempt to collect all the charmingly dumb characters for your train station, achieve high scores and unlock the famous music video that started it all.Download the FREE game now to enjoy the new fun and remember, be safe around trains. Not even for balloons!- And who knew rattlesnakes were so picky about mustard?- Doing your own electrical work? Choose the wires carefully- Mind the gap! Board the train safely- Space is no fun without a helmet. Put it on now!- Stop the clothes dryer. It‚Äôs a terrible hiding place!- Scratched the drug dealer‚Äôs ride, now avoid his bat- Taking expired medicine is not recommended- Stitch it up before bleeding out! - Perform a daring rescue from a burning building- Drag appliances back on the shelf to prevent accidents- Remember to stop at level crossings- Everyone loves bacon!  Even rattlesnakes!- Rotate the wires to complete the circuit- Only cross at pedestrian crossings - Remember the sequence for a fireworks show- Swipe to avoid a prickly crash- Sprung a leak? descriptionHTML:
You've seen the video - now the lives of those charmingly dumb characters are in your hands.

Enjoy 52 hilarious mini-games as you attempt to collect all the charmingly dumb characters for your train station, achieve high scores and unlock the famous music video that started it all.

Download the FREE game now to enjoy the new fun and remember, be safe around trains. A message from Metro.

GAMEPLAY
- Why is his hair on fire? Who cares, just RUN!
- Quickly wipe your screen free of puke
- Balance that wobbling glue eater
- Flick the piranhas out of range of those precious private parts
- Swat wasps before it's too late
- Best not invite that psycho killer inside
- Carefully remove forks from toasters
- Help self-taught pilots
- Get back from the edge of the platform you fools
- Have patience at level crossings
- No crossing the tracks! Not even for balloons!
- And who knew rattlesnakes were so picky about mustard?
- Doing your own electrical work? Choose the wires carefully
- Mind the gap! Board the train safely
- Space is no fun without a helmet. Put it on now!
- Stop the clothes dryer. It’s a terrible hiding place!
- Scratched the drug dealer’s ride, now avoid his bat
- Taking expired medicine is not recommended
- Stitch it up before bleeding out!
- Perform a daring rescue from a burning building
- Drag appliances back on the shelf to prevent accidents
- Remember to stop at level crossings
- Everyone loves bacon! Even rattlesnakes!
- Rotate the wires to complete the circuit
- Only cross at pedestrian crossings
- Remember the sequence for a fireworks show
- Swipe to avoid a prickly crash
- Sprung a leak? Sprint to the shore!
- Tap to tip toe to the ice cream
- Keep the wasp nest from hitting the ground
- Avoid eating rotten food
- Leap over forest obstacles
- Screw down the glue cap
- Find the psycho before he finds you!
- Smash the asteroids
- Hunt for treasure, but don’t get hunted yourself
- Ready, aim, and fire yourself onto an opposing galleon
- Walk the plank, but don’t fall over
- Barricade your home to stave off zombies
- Follow the recipe to brew the perfect potion
- Feed the bear candy before he feeds on you
- Build the perfect snowman, but watch out for pointy carrots
- Pouring drinks from a rickety ladder is inadvisable
- Time your jump or get stuck in a chimney
- Package the chocolates or feel love’s bite
- Don’t Dumb with scissors
- Drive up to a scenic lookout (but make sure to brake)

PLUS
- Perfect your dumb-death prevention skills to unlock the full set of characters for your train station
- Create your own Dumb Ways character from loads of facial features, accessories and more!

Watch the original Webby and Cannes award-winning video here: www.youtube.com/watch?v=IJNR2EpS0jw
developerAddress:
Metro Trains
Level 16, 700 Collins St
Docklands, VIC 3008
Australia
recentChanges: Love is in the air! Our friends have discovered even more Dumb Ways to Die in three new mini-games!
HEARTS AND CRAFTS ‚Äì Calamity is working her heart out on a set of crafts. Keep her hand steady to make sure she doesn‚Äôt get too cut up.
THE BRAKE-UP ‚Äì The most romantic lookout in the city is also the most dangerous. Help Bonehead brake before his car breaks him.
DEATH IS LIKE A BOX OF CHOCOLATES ‚Äì Fill Mishap‚Äôs box with chocolate, and fast ‚Äì his cold-blooded friend is growing impatient.
summary: You‚Äôve seen the video. Now their lives are in your hands.

comments: I played this game for a VERY long time. Recently, the creators have made lousy changes, making it difficult to get energy to play and giving us adults some stupid, useless stickers. Most of the regular players feel the changes are to force us to buy energy. Instead, many people are leaving the game, which is very unfortunate. Advertisers take notice! The creators aren't listening to the players and you may want to seriously consider before investing in this game.

It's easy, enjoyable and EVERYONE from my 73yr old mum to a young adult (due to the images and content of storyline. .not suitable for kids) can play and EVERYONE can progress no matter how agile they are with their fingers or brain. LOVE IT!!! PLAY IT EVERY DAY WITHOUT FAILüòä

this game is so addicting. the only thing I hate is that they don't reward energy anymore. No drinks etc. I just wish you didn't have to buy energy to continue . otherwise I love this game. it's a great time consumer when you are borwd

I am so addicted to this game. I only wish that after ranking so high you'd get more energy or bonuses or something.... I could play this game forever ... This one game alone keeps going... Why is there  not  access to another version at this time????...

Ads every 3rd puzzle that pop up. So freaking annoying!! I get ads for the 20 points, I HATE that they pop up out of nowhere and for no reward!!  This had a 5 star rating until I completed Pacific Bay. I went through it 3 times to earn my collector's cards. I was only able to complete 1 chapter. I spent months looking forward to a reward, only to discover if I want more cards, I'd have to pay. I will still play, but not as much as I did before.
Everything is great but it's not convenient. You get too less energy time and they ask you to pay to get more so you can play. I don't like it it's a waste of time don't get this game

comments: Nice game with very good events but the drop rates to heroes of 5 star is too low i killed a lot of gems and scrols and hero orbs and my first 5 star i  dropped it at lvl 75. Okok now again event of summoning 100 scrolls and i continue still no 5 star hero only 4, just try and fix the drop rate. In the rest its a nice game.

Fun at first, but you have to pay a lot of real money for it to stay fun. Otherwise you have to wait weeks and months to progress. Some events can only be fully completed by spending hundreds of dollars (yeah, that much). Not worth it. If you have that much money, use it on something better than this. Improve your life, use your time better, don't waste it here. Good luck!

I purchased the spring festival card on top of all the money I've already dumped into this game and the devs didn't give me my in game rewards. I've submitted numerous tickets to get a refund or my rewards and they just reply there is no problem. Ya no problem with you taking my money.  They deleted my review, wonder how many other people had this issue and had reviews deleted.

Wasn't sure about this game at first. I love it. I use a f2p  and a vip one  to see  the difference  between the two. Really well done. Having said all that the game does require patience. This is an IDLE game. You pick it up do dailies, talk, spend money, or what ever you want to do in game, then put it down to "farm gold,xp,mats". The high end heros do take some planning to aquire as a f2p player. This game requires patience because it's an IDLE game. Yes some people have a ton of money to throw at the game but don't be jealous, just play your game and have fun.

Honestly gameplay and all is good but the game is so p2w it's not funny, it would cost u over a hundred dollars just to complete every reward for new Valentine's event. If you like this game play private server instead this version is a giant cash grab. Not competitive for f2p at all

There is certainly alot to do, but is there really much to DO do? I've just been continually tapping red dots and getting free prizes, which (although nice) doesn't feel like I'm especially earning anything, you know?  Feels like a game that will keep you occupied for maybe months, but a year after you delete it will you really REMEMBER it? Probably not.

"Android Excellence Game" of Google Play. Play with 12 million global players!
Join millions of other players around the world and start your journey from Sara Forest to the High Heaven, leading your band of heroes into ancient ruins to battle the forces of darkness!

GAME FEATURES:

★IDLE System★
Set your heroes training while you’re away. When you return to your phone, they will be stronger, gained new abilities, and ready for battle. Grow & Train a powerful squad without all the grinding!

★Evolving Strategy★
More than 200 Heroes in different factions with specific skills. Summon your Warriors, TRAIN them to become powerful heroes, or convert them into Spirit material for EVOLVING. Forge magical gears, and outfit your warriors for victory!

★TONS of Content★
With battlegrounds galore and dungeons aplenty, heroic quests, mysterious towers, arena, guild, much fun to enjoy!

★GUILD Wars★
Fight alongside your friends and players everywhere in a war for control of the floating continent. Join multiplayer guild boss-battles and lead your guild to supremacy!

★Worldwide Arena★
Put forth your best heroes to do battle in the ARENA. Watch them PK online in a multiplayer contest for glory! Climb the Leader board for the best rewards!

description: Get Bomber Friends now and join the immensely hectic and fun online multiplayer game! Bomb your friends and be the last to survive to win the match! Collect powerups to get more powerful bombs! Use the explosive bombs to blast your friends from across the map!And don't worry if you get blasted, then the fun has just begun! Challenge your friends or play against random opponents.- Campaign mode with over 300 levels! descriptionHTML:
Get Bomber Friends now and join the immensely hectic and fun online multiplayer game! Bomb your friends and be the last to survive to win the match!
Collect powerups to get more powerful bombs! Use the explosive bombs to blast your friends from across the map!
And don't worry if you get blasted, then the fun has just begun! Dead bombers can haunt the living players and make their play harder with curses!

Game Features:
- Online multiplayer for 2-8 players! Challenge your friends or play against random opponents.
- Campaign mode with over 300 levels! Find your way through 6 different worlds full of devious monsters!
- Classic Bomber style gameplay, with controls polished for touchscreen!
- Collect powerups and watch out for evil curses.
- Customize your bomber man or woman with cool hats, taunts, and greetings!
- Different bombs to blast the enemies to smithereens.
- Includes google play achievements and leaderboards.
- Bomber Friends has universal game controller support!
- Supports Android TV!

Have fun!

*Important message: This game includes in-app purchases. You can set up password protection for in-app purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app.*

Hermiankatu 6 L
33720 Tampere
Finland

description: War has evolved, and so has the best online FPS on mobile! Step onto the battlefield and answer the call with the title that raised the bar for first person shooter games with its great graphics, high-powered guns and intense online multiplayer action. Create a squad from 9 classes, add your friends for team play and test your skills in dynamic warfare against online rivals from around the world!Prefer to work alone? Then feel free to step into the thrilling solo play campaign as you shoot your way through one dire situation after another to save the world as you launch an attack against a lunatic‚Äôs apocalyptic plans.You won‚Äôt find more first person shooter fun in a free game anywhere!9 CLASSES WITH UNIQUE SKILLS> Customize and level up any of the 9 classes across solo play and team play modes. > Find the playstyle that suits you: Assault, Heavy, Recon, Sniper, Support, Bounty Hunter, Sapper, X1-Morph, or Kommander.> Activate class-specific skills by earning and spending Skill Points.HIGH-POWERED ONLINE MULTIPLAYER > Watch players engaged in live online FPS battles and eSports competitions with all the great graphics you expect in the new Spectator mode.> Epic guns-a-blazing team play in Squad vs. Squad matches.> Talk to other players to plan your online multiplayer strategies and coordinate an attack in the Global and Squad Chats.> Top the individual and Squads leaderboards as you master your eSports skills.> Win free rewards and cool prizes in limited-time events.UNIFIED GAME PROGRESSION> Accumulate XP and level up by playing both solo play missions and team play matches.> Unlock higher-tier guns and other weapons by mastering lower-tier guns.> Customize the perfect weapon using a host of attachments and jump straight into the free game action.INTENSE SOLO PLAY CAMPAIGN > Engage in fast-paced story missions where the call will take you from Tokyo to Venice for a variety of first person shooter challenges.> Play the new Spec Ops missions for a real online FPS adrenaline rush.> Great graphics, music and voice performances perfectly adapted for a first person shooter game.HIGHLY CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROLS> Intuitive, highly customizable controls so you can play the game just the way you want.> Modern Combat 5 supports HID game controllers. MOGA Pro is also supported, in mode B (HID Mode).Modern Combat 5 requires an Internet connection.So if you‚Äôre ready for the online FPS of your dreams, dive into this unparalleled free game that takes online multiplayer to new heights. Perfect for anyone hungry for solo play first person shooter fun, or team play eSports competition._____________________________________________Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_ENCheck out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/centralDon't forget to follow us on social media:Facebook: http://gmlft.co/FBMCGPTwitter: http://gmlft.co/twmcgpInstagram: http://gmlft.co/GL_SNS_IGYouTube: http://gmlft.co/ytmcgpForum: http://gmlft.co/MC5FRThis app allows you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.Terms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en/conditions-of-usePrivacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en/privacy-noticeEnd-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en/eula
descriptionHTML:
War has evolved, and so has the best online FPS on mobile!

Step onto the battlefield and answer the call with the title that raised the bar for first person shooter games with its great graphics, high-powered guns and intense online multiplayer action. Create a squad from 9 classes, add your friends for team play and test your skills in dynamic warfare against online rivals from around the world!

Prefer to work alone? Then feel free to step into the thrilling solo play campaign as you shoot your way through one dire situation after another to save the world as you launch an attack against a lunatic’s apocalyptic plans.

You won’t find more first person shooter fun in a free game anywhere!

9 CLASSES WITH UNIQUE SKILLS
> Customize and level up any of the 9 classes across solo play and team play modes.
> Find the playstyle that suits you: Assault, Heavy, Recon, Sniper, Support, Bounty Hunter, Sapper, X1-Morph, or Kommander.
> Activate class-specific skills by earning and spending Skill Points.

HIGH-POWERED ONLINE MULTIPLAYER
> Watch players engaged in live online FPS battles and eSports competitions with all the great graphics you expect in the new Spectator mode.
> Epic guns-a-blazing team play in Squad vs. Squad matches.
> Talk to other players to plan your online multiplayer strategies and coordinate an attack in the Global and Squad Chats.
> Top the individual and Squads leaderboards as you master your eSports skills.
> Win free rewards and cool prizes in limited-time events.

UNIFIED GAME PROGRESSION
> Accumulate XP and level up by playing both solo play missions and team play matches.
> Unlock higher-tier guns and other weapons by mastering lower-tier guns.
> Customize the perfect weapon using a host of attachments and jump straight into the free game action.

INTENSE SOLO PLAY CAMPAIGN
> Engage in fast-paced story missions where the call will take you from Tokyo to Venice for a variety of first person shooter challenges.
> Play the new Spec Ops missions for a real online FPS adrenaline rush.
> Great graphics, music and voice performances perfectly adapted for a first person shooter game.

HIGHLY CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROLS
> Intuitive, highly customizable controls so you can play the game just the way you want.
> Modern Combat 5 supports HID game controllers. MOGA Pro is also supported, in mode B (HID Mode).

Modern Combat 5 requires an Internet connection.

So if you’re ready for the online FPS of your dreams, dive into this unparalleled free game that takes online multiplayer to new heights. Perfect for anyone hungry for solo play first person shooter fun, or team play eSports competition.


_____________________________________________

descriptionHTML:
Catboy, Gekko and Owlette are back in this brand new PJ Masks game app.

Choose your favourite hero character to play with and journey across the moonlit rooftops, and through the night, collecting as many orbs as you can. But beware of those pesky villains, they’re up to mischief again!

FEATURES

Collectable orbs
The hero characters will be able to collect orbs to add to their final score.

Gold Amulets
Each character is able to pick up gold amulets along the way to boost their final score. Make sure to keep your eyes out for them as they’re harder to find!

Character Power-ups
Collect the coloured amulets and trigger the heroes’ super powers:
Catboy – ability to jump higher
Owlette – ability to see hidden orbs
Gekko – ability to smash through obstacles

Hazards
Help the heroes dodgy the obstacles the villains are throwing in their way!

The PJ Masks are on their way, into the night to save the day!

No adverts, no in-app purchases, just lots of action and fun!

Please note: This app is not compatible with some older Android devices

45 Warren Street
London
W1T 6AG

comments: Love this game but can be frustrating when I hit the zombies and they keep going and I lose the game. After a while I have to stop as I get too excited. I hate the hiding construction workers. If I don't knock them out at the top of the screen, they get too low down and I miss them. Hate it when I accidentally hit the people when the game throws everything at you. I have a super fast finger, but, sometimes not fast enough. It takes concentration and fast reflexes to advance in this game. I gave it 5 stars.  Might go and read the help section for tips. All I want to say is try it.

One of the best games out there!  The only thing I would change is the placement of the power tools as I will often activate one when killing a zombie. Great work!  Hope there is a version II coming out soon! descriptionHTML:
Zombie Smasher is the #1 addicting and entertaining game available on Google Play.

Get ready to defend your home as a mob of zombies is about to invade your town! Those undead creatures are back, and it's up to you to keep them brainless. Use your finger to tap on the zombies to smash and eliminate them before they break down your door.

How to Play:
- Simply touch the zombies to kill them
- Don't hit the kids surfers from neighborhood
- Use the special power-ups wisely

Game Features:
- Story Mode (60 levels and more to come), Survival Mode, Time Mode
- 7 totally terrifying enemy zombie breeds (normal, dog, oilworker, timberman, ghost, baby & fat boss)
- Amazing visuals & immersive CD quality audio
- Intense zombie-blasting action game play fit for subway time

If you don't want to spend real cash don't bother downloading this game. Also most reviews for this game are fake. All dated the same day and 5 stars.  (3/10/2018) Good game so far but why all the fake reviews? 1000 reviews all dated 3/10/2018.  Graphics are the best I've seen in any game. The structure of the game is very similar to Kill Shot games by Hothead. Almost like it was made by them under a different name. Weird.

I like shooting games a lot but lots zombie games are stupid this is simple but if you don't buy stuff you can't go further??I just want to play!! It's a good game though, graphics are good, controls are good, so well done!!

As far as action cell phone games go, this is really good. You can't expect all the versatility of a console or pc on your phone (at least not yet) so all things considered, this is a great game. I've been playing for a few weeks and no pop ups or ads so that's a plus. I imagine you'd have to have a capable device though. This would never have ran so smoothly on my old Blu Studio Energy. It plays awesome on my new Samsung S8 plus though

After the recent update cash does not come up at all in the small and big crates. Before the update always atleast 7000 cash used to come up in the small crates. Please don't update.  Very smooth gameplay. Combines RPG shooter and sniper gaming in one game.

comments: It's a pretty good game for just short periods of time like waiting in line. It's a good online game you play with other people although the connections are not the greatest. Controls are sometimes not that great because sometimes there is a nice open play on one side of the field and your character passes it into a field of defenders. I think the game passes where it sees the most players on your team, it does not care about how many defenders are over there. It's not my top game I've ever played, but I would recommend it for a every once in a while game.

This game is absolutely awful. Everything is so luck based. There is no skill involved in this game whatsoever. If you're lucky and have a big wallet you'll be top on the leaderboards. The tackling is dreadful, only based around luck, the passing is based around luck, the dribbling is based around luck and the shooting is terrible. There is nothing redeeming about this game at all. The gameplay itself isn't fun and you should definitely avoid this game at all costs.

The idea's good, as it was in Score and Score Hero, but it has several flaws. No offline (vs AI) mode. Can't discard/delete reward boxes, you have to open them (time-locked, or spend cash). Can't cancel tackle, despite having an activation delay. Can't control goalie saves (except in penalty shoots). If it had all that, it'd be a 5 star game.

Good game but frame rate drops really low quite often and it uses way too much battery. Checking battery status reported it had used 6% of a full charge after only 37mins. Feels like some finishing off is needed but this game is brilliant. I'm playing this on a Pixel 2.

Edit - frame rate is a shambles since the update. The opposition now doesn't even need to pause or stop to play the next move. Not even worth a download. Shocking how this was even released. Good game but poor execution. The logic is there but it always favours the opposition. Simple moves can't be pulled off but can by the opposition. You draw a perfectly straight line and the ball follows a completely different path.

Great game Not pay to win Recommend it to everyone Please add these features-- 1- add friend option        So that we can be friend with whoever we play 2 -create a clan mode      Where player can play Team with most points win 3- add one more storage P.s-Thanks for developing this game

comments: Its way to hard to win and and the stats do nothing.  You have to be perfect and even then they fly by.  Still LOVE this game.  Just takes away the fun when you get left in the dust and you play the same lvl a million times hoping maybe one time you will be perfect.

You shouldve stuck to the roots pf the game.  You made the game very 2 dimensional by removing the acceleration boost you get from doing flips like you had in the first game, not to mention you also dumbed down the contols. You shouldve kept the original style of the first one. Mad Skillz BMX is one of the only reasons i keep my tiny ipod touch around.

The game is fun up until around the third level. After that it becomes near impossible to win any races without spending actual money to upgrade your bike. Had a lot of fun with it up until that point, but it's definitely not worth spending actual money on. Deleted the game after pay to win clearly became a necessity.

I expected the physics to be as flawless as Turborilla's MX games but they're not at all. Clunky, inconsistent physics leave you shaking your head and trying in vain to sum up what you did differently than the 100 previous attempts.

Awesome game!  Earning money is easy especially with online play and watching ads.  ONLY downfall is earning gold can be a pain,  seem like the only way to get gold is by beating a boss, buying gold with real cash and levelling up which can take some time.  Other then that it's a very addictive game if you love BMX that is.  Folloq me on instagram @evans_customz

Very good game but I wish there was a better way of getting gold without having to pay out of your hard working money. Since when did games start asking for cash? I would pay to buy the game but buying gold is stupid as hell.. either way very good game

comments: Addictive!!! The characters have so much PERSONALITY. The graphics are awesome. I like playing with Chumbot Ogie!! . It's like playing with a real person. Alot of FUN! I decided to purchase the game and get rid of the Ads. Well worth it!! This is the best word game out there!! I love watching the characters go into the store to shop and when they come out they have on different costumes. Some are so funny. I just sit watch them come out sometimes. One about every 15 seconds or so. I crack up, HILARIOUS! Better than plain Scrabble. Love, love, love IT! Please, don't change anything and mess it up.

The new update, where you get ads that blare at you for 5 sec before you can close them? Not cool.  Update... they are gone!! Thx!!  I have another request - is it possible to keep track of the number of times someone scores a 7 letter bingo, or a best word?  I would love to see those numbers in my dashboard too! Thx.

Great fun, very challenging & a sleek new design.  It's different to Scrabble or WWF in a good way. You can quickly see if you've made a word, plus you get extra points for long words. Lots of players, so you never go short of a game, & now there's a quick play mode too.

The items to accessorize seriously needs to be updated, which would only make me spend more. All of the knightly garb is not that interesting for everyone. The hair choices are clearly geared for white people, and more food  needs to be offered (mexican, asian, african, etc) because  I love to change all of the time. Lastly, we should be able to sort and organize our accessories so they are easier to see and select - like a real closet!

Ran out of tickets & not sure where to get more tickets, all I see was buy buy buy.. It has to be Wi-Fi connected to pay this game Many players didn't respond, all I did was just waiting waiting & waiting!  It's fun game though... Too bad had to give up playing

This game is great,  especially if you aren't so good at making words because it helps by highlighting and using the stars. The only thing I would change is to make a version where the boards are random. Scatter the bonus tiles around to make it a little more interesting.
description: Word Chums is the highest rated word puzzle game, voted 4.8 stars by Android users. Play free with friends or solo against the computer!‚óÜ For lovers of anagrams, word builder games or crossword puzzles like Scrabble or Words with Friends, Word Chums takes it to another level with fun graphics and sounds, a built-in dictionary, team mode, 3-4 player mode, and more.‚óÜ Word Chums is a new word game that‚Äôs easy to pick up and play, but challenging to master. It‚Äôs fun for the whole family or with friends ‚Äì you‚Äôll love it, we promise! Try it once and you just may find yourself doing a daily crossword puzzle game with several of your friends!‚óÜ INTRODUCING THE CHUMS Oozing with personality, they bring the game to life. Have fun earning gear to outfit your Chum and expressing your style. They‚Äôre guaranteed to make you chuckle.‚óÜ NAGARAM-ANAGRAM WORD TEASERPut your vocabulary to the test in this word making game by rearranging a word scramble into a real word that you can play. The better your word‚Äôs Scrabble dictionary score, the more XP you earn. XP helps you level up and unlock more gear for your chums!‚óÜ INCREDIBLY STREAMLINED GAMEPLAY Word Chums is a pleasure to play. See words validate instantly as you place letters and see the scoring badge automatically indicate word strength.‚óÜ FAMILIAR WORD BUILDING GAMEPLAY, CROSS WORD STYLEWord Chums stays true to the classic word builder gameplay that vocabulary game lovers enjoy and cross word lovers can‚Äôt get enough of.‚óÜ EARN TOP CHUM STATUS Earn experience points with each word played and level up to become King or Queen of the Chums. Show off your ‚Äúwordly‚Äù prowess by climbing your way to the top of the weekly crossword game leaderboards. ‚óÜ A TRULY SOCIAL WORD PUZZLE GAMESee how all your friends are doing from the friends list on the main screen. Experience a new level of collaborative word puzzle game fun by grabbing a teammate for a couples word game online. Invite anyone you like, whether they‚Äôre friends, family, adults or kids. Word Chums is the best word game app that‚Äôs easy to learn, challenging to master and fun for all!‚óÜ SAY GOODBYE TO GETTING STUMPED If you suddenly feel like you‚Äôre playing a word scramble game and need some help figuring out a word you can use, just activate Word search hints. In a pinch, Word search hints can point you to the location of a better word and help you unscramble your vocabulary memory.‚óÜ A NEW WORD GAME TO SATISFY THE SERIOUS GAMER For all the daily crossword puzzle gamers, Word Chums offers achievements, best word challenges, leveling, player stats, crossword game leaderboards and much more. descriptionHTML:
Word Chums is the highest rated word puzzle game, voted 4.8 stars by Android users. Play free with friends or solo against the computer!

◆ For lovers of anagrams, word builder games or crossword puzzles like Scrabble or Words with Friends, Word Chums takes it to another level with fun graphics and sounds, a built-in dictionary, team mode, 3-4 player mode, and more.

◆ Word Chums is a new word game that’s easy to pick up and play, but challenging to master. It’s fun for the whole family or with friends – you’ll love it, we promise! Try it once and you just may find yourself doing a daily crossword puzzle game with several of your friends!

◆ INTRODUCING THE CHUMS
Oozing with personality, they bring the game to life. Have fun earning gear to outfit your Chum and expressing your style. They’re guaranteed to make you chuckle.

◆ NAGARAM-ANAGRAM WORD TEASER
Put your vocabulary to the test in this word making game by rearranging a word scramble into a real word that you can play. The better your word’s Scrabble dictionary score, the more XP you earn. XP helps you level up and unlock more gear for your chums!

◆ INCREDIBLY STREAMLINED GAMEPLAY
Word Chums is a pleasure to play. See words validate instantly as you place letters and see the scoring badge automatically indicate word strength.

◆ FAMILIAR WORD BUILDING GAMEPLAY, CROSS WORD STYLE
Word Chums stays true to the classic word builder gameplay that vocabulary game lovers enjoy and cross word lovers can’t get enough of.

◆ EARN TOP CHUM STATUS
Earn experience points with each word played and level up to become King or Queen of the Chums. Show off your “wordly” prowess by climbing your way to the top of the weekly crossword game leaderboards.

◆ A TRULY SOCIAL WORD PUZZLE GAME
See how all your friends are doing from the friends list on the main screen. Experience a new level of collaborative word puzzle game fun by grabbing a teammate for a couples word game online. Invite anyone you like, whether they’re friends, family, adults or kids. Word Chums is the best word game app that’s easy to learn, challenging to master and fun for all!

◆ SAY GOODBYE TO GETTING STUMPED
If you suddenly feel like you’re playing a word scramble game and need some help figuring out a word you can use, just activate Word search hints. In a pinch, Word search hints can point you to the location of a better word and help you unscramble your vocabulary memory.

◆ A NEW WORD GAME TO SATISFY THE SERIOUS GAMER
For all the daily crossword puzzle gamers, Word Chums offers achievements, best word challenges, leveling, player stats, crossword game leaderboards and much more. It’s a deep gaming experience for everyone that gamers can master.

◆ LEARN A LITTLE
Word Chums is the best word game online, great for adults and kids alike! As a vocabulary game, Word Chums is great for word maker game lovers looking to get their text twist on and flex their anagram game muscles, while also helping beginners to expand their vocabulary via the built-in dictionary – just tap any word to see its definition. Experiment with new letter combinations and instantly discover new words to succeed.

——————————————————————
◆ SPECIAL FEATURES
• 2-4 player games
• Play versus friends, random opponents, and computer Chumbots
• Customizable Chum characters
• Scrabble based dictionary – Know valid words before you press play
• Automatically see the strength of your word
• Weekly cross word game leaderboard competitions
• Find the best word and beat the hint challenges
• Drop a Bomb and take your turn with a new set of letters
——————————————————————
◆ ABOUT PeopleFun
Word Chums is a word builder game, and comes to you from the makers of Age of Empires, one of the best-selling and most award-winning games of all time. Give it a try!

descriptionHTML:
The most competitive badminton games ever! Take on your friends in 1 vs 1 mode, or win the Badminton League trophy🏆 in Tournament Mode!

Customizing your character with tons of items. And level up your ability to do stronger smash and jump!

Now grab your racket to smash, hit the shuttlecock, do a crazy smash to your opponent like badminton star!

Features:
- Multiple game modes available, play with sports fans in local
- Create your very own character, and level - up
- Easy to control, challenging to win
- Simple and elegant UI design
- Cool stunts and realistic hitting shuttlecock experience
- Numerous gorgeous badminton outfits

How to play with friends in 1 vs 1 Mode:
1. Connect the same WiFi or Personal Hotspot with your friends
2. Open "Badminton League" and select 1 vs 1 Mode together
3. Bet with coins, tap "HOST" to create a room, then waiting for your friend to join
4. Check the name which shows on the board, then tap to join
5. Now you will know who is the Newbie

Remind your friends to download Badminton League before above operation :)

This game needs an internet connection to play.
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Badminton-League-203729826806154/

comments: I rarely enjoy a game enough to write a review detailing the game.  I was honestly bored and losing hope when downloading this game.  Once it finished I almost didn't start playing, but I'm absolutely happy I checked it out.  I have just put over 3 hours into a game I figured I would toss, and I see no signs of slowing down.  Excellent gameplay, storyline,  controls, ... everything.  It had be a long time since I've been this impressed.

Well, just play today and not bad but nice work. Not sure about bug or something. I just need play more to get more experience about this game. Maybe I will cahange my review if there are something bugging about this game. Nice work btw.. Just keep it up!
I wasted 1,548 mb for a black screen. (Still i gave 3 stars) Nothing comes up. After the prolouge and update download only a black screen appears whenever i try to open it. Please fix this.

Wish you would let us upgrade skills with just the same skill item, not require us to get the exact item too with the same skill, at least you don't require the same star rank. You should learn a thing or two from Warriors Orochi 3.
Endgame is gear grinding. Game frequently crashes affecting gameplay a lot. Fun when it works though. Controls are a bit of a lottery with inconsistent behaviour. Big problems with targeting enemies

Overall it seems like a good game. There are a few issues with chat features, but this seems to be par for the course for GAMEFORCE. The other problem I seem to have is almost a daily need to uninstall and reinstall the game, if this continues i will have no qualms with dumping it.
description: Neither fate nor lineage can make a hero -- you must grab your sword and become one yourself!Forge your epic destiny in Iron Blade -- the most thrilling of all action RPG games -- set in a medieval Europe filled with war, discord and magic. Explore a fantasy game world brought to life with console-quality graphics and an innovative -- yet easy to learn -- combat system that is never idle and always throws you into one heart-pounding fight after another!Collect amazing weapons for your monster hunter, explore breathtaking real-world locations and dungeon strongholds to test your skills against millions of other players as your build your own kingdom and engage in exciting PvP challenges.**GAME FEATURES**AN EPIC ODYSSEY - A demonic army of war approaches, and no castle is safe from their discord and bloodlust. This is no time to be idle! Raise your sword, become a monster hunter and fulfill the prophecy to seal them away for good!- Unravel a plot of intrigue and betrayal as you fight through this RPG game's challenging story missions.- Explore a game world rich in lore and set in an alternate-reality fantasy Europe, full of epic warriors, discord and arcane mysteries.- Your RPG adventure games will take you through many awe-inspiring locations beyond any other RPG games, from a fight with Demon Knights in Notre Dame to putting vampires to the sword in a Transylvanian dungeon.A LINEAGE OF WAR- Everyone can enjoy the deep dungeon-crawling RPG action thanks to controls that were specially designed for a mobile game, which allow you to smoothly perform amazing chains of sword attacks in the heat of war.- Develop your fantasy fight style by linking up taps and swipes in the game to perform monster-hunter combos.- Face a fearsome variety of epic dungeon foes, each rendered from beautiful art, and brought to life with amazing game graphics, action and combat abilities.- Unleash deadly special-action attacks and finishing sword-moves that deliver a grizzly end to any who dare to battle against you in war.THE KING OF RPG GAMES- Fight with fantasy weapons and war armor that you can collect in your RPG adventure games.- Upgrade your monster-hunter gear to customize your fighting strengths and war style.- Unleash devastating spells and high-action skills on your in-game foes.COMPETE WITH PLAYERS- Establish your own epic fantasy RPG kingdom that you can fortify with a Castle.- Acquire and upgrade Castle Defenders of the finest lineage to fight off invaders and protect its resources from discord while you're idle or away from the game.- Take action and wage war on other players' Castle strongholds to crush their defenses and loot their most valuable resources for yourself!For fans of RPG games, action, discord, sword-swinging role-playing games, fantasy, monster-hunter knight games, descriptionHTML:
Neither fate nor lineage can make a hero -- you must grab your sword and become one yourself!

Forge your epic destiny in Iron Blade -- the most thrilling of all action RPG games -- set in a medieval Europe filled with war, discord and magic. Explore a fantasy game world brought to life with console-quality graphics and an innovative -- yet easy to learn -- combat system that is never idle and always throws you into one heart-pounding fight after another!

Collect amazing weapons for your monster hunter, explore breathtaking real-world locations and dungeon strongholds to test your skills against millions of other players as your build your own kingdom and engage in exciting PvP challenges.

**GAME FEATURES**

AN EPIC ODYSSEY
- A demonic army of war approaches, and no castle is safe from their discord and bloodlust. This is no time to be idle! Raise your sword, become a monster hunter and fulfill the prophecy to seal them away for good!
- Unravel a plot of intrigue and betrayal as you fight through this RPG game's challenging story missions.
- Explore a game world rich in lore and set in an alternate-reality fantasy Europe, full of epic warriors, discord and arcane mysteries.
- Your RPG adventure games will take you through many awe-inspiring locations beyond any other RPG games, from a fight with Demon Knights in Notre Dame to putting vampires to the sword in a Transylvanian dungeon.

A LINEAGE OF WAR
- Everyone can enjoy the deep dungeon-crawling RPG action thanks to controls that were specially designed for a mobile game, which allow you to smoothly perform amazing chains of sword attacks in the heat of war.
- Develop your fantasy fight style by linking up taps and swipes in the game to perform monster-hunter combos.
- Face a fearsome variety of epic dungeon foes, each rendered from beautiful art, and brought to life with amazing game graphics, action and combat abilities.
- Unleash deadly special-action attacks and finishing sword-moves that deliver a grizzly end to any who dare to battle against you in war.

THE KING OF RPG GAMES
- Fight with fantasy weapons and war armor that you can collect in your RPG adventure games.
- Upgrade your monster-hunter gear to customize your fighting strengths and war style.
- Unleash devastating spells and high-action skills on your in-game foes.

COMPETE WITH PLAYERS
- Establish your own epic fantasy RPG kingdom that you can fortify with a Castle.
- Acquire and upgrade Castle Defenders of the finest lineage to fight off invaders and protect its resources from discord while you're idle or away from the game.
- Take action and wage war on other players' Castle strongholds to crush their defenses and loot their most valuable resources for yourself!

descriptionHTML:
In Burger Shop, you successfully created a universal chain of restaurants and found fame and fortune... Until one day, you found yourself in a dumpster with a bump on your head, your restaurants boarded up, and no memory of how any of it happened.

Now in Burger Shop 2 you must rebuild your restaurant empire, adding new twists to your menu to entice new customers while uncovering the truth about what happened to your original restaurant chain.

Grab ingredients from the BurgerTron 2000 to create tasty food items to serve hungry customers in this fast-paced food making game!

GAME FEATURES:
• 120 Story Levels and 120 Expert Levels!
• Challenge Modes and Relax Modes!
• Server breakfast, lunch, and dinner!
• Over 100 different food items!
• Over 100 trophies to collect!
• Unlimited play!

Burger Shop 2 offers endless play with four different play modes!

GAME MODES:

• Story Mode - Rebuild your restaurant empire, and solve the mystery of who or what destroyed your original burger chain.

• Challenge Mode - Play lightning fast one-minute rounds - but don't lose a customer or it's all over!

• Relax Mode - Serve food without any pressure or stress. Customers are infinitely patient.

• Expert Mode - So, you think you are the Burger Master? Put your food-making skills to the test!


Available in 11 languages: English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Swedish, Indonesian, Russian, and Japanese.

description: Last Battleground: Survival is a survival shooter game. Each match takes 40 players and puts them on a deserted island. At the start of the game, all players parachute onto the island completely empty-handed.The way the game unfolds is: players are spread around the island unarmed and must find and use various weapons and items to eliminate opponents.As time goes on, the island's "safe zone" gets smaller and smaller, and certain areas will also be bombarded. Players and teams will be ranked for the match in the order they are eliminated.The safe zone changes randomly in each match, providing players with a fresher, more intense experience each time.Remember, find a weapon and supplies as quickly as you can and then move to the island‚Äôs safe zone.This is not just a game, this is battle for survival!!!PLEASE NOTE! Last Battleground: Survival is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Last Battleground: Survival.Have any questions or issues with the game from Elex Tech? descriptionHTML:
Last Battleground: Survival is a survival shooter game. Each match takes 40 players and puts them on a deserted island. At the start of the game, all players parachute onto the island completely empty-handed.

The way the game unfolds is: players are spread around the island unarmed and must find and use various weapons and items to eliminate opponents.

As time goes on, the island's "safe zone" gets smaller and smaller, and certain areas will also be bombarded. Players and teams will be ranked for the match in the order they are eliminated.

The safe zone changes randomly in each match, providing players with a fresher, more intense experience each time.
Remember, find a weapon and supplies as quickly as you can and then move to the island’s safe zone.

This is not just a game, this is battle for survival!!!

PLEASE NOTE! Last Battleground: Survival is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Last Battleground: Survival.

Have any questions or issues with the game from Elex Tech?
Reach us at: LastBattleground.help@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LastBattleground/

This is a jewel in the Talking Tom series.  I am an adult, and I am thoroughly hooked!  I have to be on every day to do the daily challenge, no matter my schedule.  The snowboard side world is amazing.  I have never been able to ride a skateboard, much less a snowboard, but I admire the snowboarders and skateboarders who can.  With this world, I can, and it feels real!  My only caveat is that after Ben's world, there are no more new houses to conquer and work on.  So I earn gold bars and diamonds for nothing.   We advanced players need more houses!  Make Tom a vacation home or hunting cabin, I don't know!   Anyway, love the graphics, even the side ones as I run by don't go unnoticed.

description: Welcome to Gardenscapes! Rake your way through a storyline full of unexpected twists and turns to restore a wonderful garden to its former glory. Embark on an adventurous journey: beat match-3 levels, restore and decorate different areas in the garden, get to the bottom of the secrets it holds, and enjoy the company of amusing in-game characters, including Austin, your butler, and a funny dog! What are you waiting for? Indulge yourself in some gardening and become the hero of a brand new story. Build your dream garden for free! The game features:‚óè Addictive gameplay: swap and match, restore and decorate the garden, and be part of a breath-taking adventure all at once!‚óè Hundreds of unique match-3 levels‚óè Dozens of in-game characters you can make friends with‚óè An adorable puppy who is always there to cheer you up‚óè An in-game social network you can use to keep tabs on everything‚óè Different areas in the garden, each with unique structures: broken fountains, mysterious mazes, an old mansion, and much more‚óè A community that comes first ‚Äî be neighbors with your Facebook friends!‚óè A super addicting game you can even play offline! Gardenscapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. Enjoying Gardenscapes? descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Gardenscapes! Rake your way through a storyline full of unexpected twists and turns to restore a wonderful garden to its former glory.

Embark on an adventurous journey: beat match-3 levels, restore and decorate different areas in the garden, get to the bottom of the secrets it holds, and enjoy the company of amusing in-game characters, including Austin, your butler, and a funny dog! What are you waiting for? Indulge yourself in some gardening and become the hero of a brand new story. Build your dream garden for free!

The game features:
● Addictive gameplay: swap and match, restore and decorate the garden, and be part of a breath-taking adventure all at once!
● Hundreds of unique match-3 levels
● Dozens of in-game characters you can make friends with
● An adorable puppy who is always there to cheer you up
● An in-game social network you can use to keep tabs on everything
● Different areas in the garden, each with unique structures: broken fountains, mysterious mazes, an old mansion, and much more
● A community that comes first — be neighbors with your Facebook friends!
● A super addicting game you can even play offline!

comments: Can one also be able yo take turns??  I dont like it straight all the way to nowere. And brake should be fully efective one should STOP anytime he wants and also dont sale cars it should just be affordable by coins  Its really a gr8 game but only a little more work.

Spin my ride No more speed, I'm almost there! Gotta keep cool, now gotta take care. Last car to pass, here I go! As the line of cars are going so slow! 5 star rad! Gotta get back to the game, all. See ya....Speed thrills!

The game itself is very fun to play and very entertaining, however, the points system is a bit off. The reason for that is it not about the distant (which I like about) it about how many overtake you can take in a single game. That is what I dislike about this game. Also the cars... Not a lot of cars (need more). Few questions: Will there be such thing as upgrade speed or car customization? Will there be special event like special map that the highest rank get some kind of reward? And lastly will there be a competition of ranking ?  If all the that happening in the future this game definitely deserved 5 stars .

Basic. You have to over take cars... That's it. When they talk about the physics being like simulation they are lieing. Left right go stop. Poor 16bit sound that you will want to turn off. It's like a game from the 80s. Uninstall.

Incredibly boring gameplay with absolutely no objective. I got bored within minutes after realising that there's nothing to do. No improvements on the first version. Why not add a chase element or even timed checkpoints... anything even?!

The game is very good but I really wish if the score is for the overtakes as well as the high speed that will be a lot better. Also, I wish if there were more cars. That would be really interesting. Actually it needs a lot of work because it's very boring

comments: Great potential, but there needs to be a way to earn free gems for the abundance of chest I have... Also there needs to be time to clean up the map once The main objective is completed and definently more chalice for chances to complete levels, I only have a certain amount of time to play so I need to fit it into my time, not yours.... Ok game but not a great game for the players, micro-transaction heavy and very little chances to complete the levels.

Please remove The Challenges. The timer runs out too early on all of the challenges, all the way up to challenge 20. I have all the standard levels finished. I have been waiting for you to make new standard levels. The timer is cheating people in your challenges. There is no way they can be completed. I am not buying 50 gems to add 2 minutes. That's a waste of my money.

This game is definitely extremely addicting! I find myself playing this game more than any other. I'd give this game 4 stars simply because there are way too many locked boxes that I have on my land that I can't open. I think there should be an easier way to get purple gems or have a way to get them on every level we beat. Atleast 5 gems each time. I have over 50 locked boxes

This game is wonderfully enjoyable but im very upset as I made an in-game purchase of gems and items and although Google confirmed my purchase when my game crashed it wiped my gems and any related items I had. The "contact us" button was very unhelpful and only had what looks more like a generic FAQ rather than a way to actually contact about problems like this. I would be happy to change my review if you could work on a better way to contact and also figure out why my purchase was wiped to prevent it in the future.

I actually really like it. But since the new update yesterday there is no chance to get "rid" of the chests without paying. This is annoying. I have not the space respectively the storage to keep them

descriptionHTML:
Discover dragon legends, magic, quests, and a secret land of entertainment and mystery in the world of Merge Dragons! where you can combine everything into better and better things by matching!

In a mystical world hidden among the clouds, the vale of Dragonia flourished. Then evil Zomblins cast a void across the vale. The only hope to heal the land rests in YOUR magical power to MATCH ANYTHING -- dragon eggs, trees, treasures, stars, magical flowers, and even mythical creatures.

Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons, then evolve them to discover more powerful dragons! Figure out challenging puzzle levels: match the Gaia statues to win, then bring rewards back to your Camp to collect and grow.

What will you discover as you match your camp to perfection and nurture your dragons?

MERGE DRAGONS! FEATURES:

== Match Objects ==
• Discover over 500 fantastic objects to match and interact with.
• Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and match 3 of a kind evolve them into better things!
• Match nearly anything - plants, buildings, coins, treasures, fallen stars, magic objects, mythical creatures, and more!
• Match Life Essence and tap it to unleash power to heal the vale!
• Discover the Gaia statues stuck in each level’s cursed land. Match them to solve the puzzle and create life!

== Collect New Dragon Breeds ==
• Discover 17 dragon breeds who live in the vale, and evolve them through 8 growth stages for new dragons!
• Match eggs to hatch helpful dragons who will roam the vale and harvest objects for you to use or match.

== Tricky Puzzles ==
• Over 600 quests to challenge your mind!
• Test your puzzle solving skills in more than 140 tricky levels filled with new quests and rewards to help you build your dragon camp!
• Discover hidden levels - can you find them all?
• On your puzzle journey, you may cross paths with evil Zomblins. Watch out and be careful!

Download now and discover where Merge Dragons! will take you!

Merge Dragons! is brought to you by Gram Games, the studio behind the top hit titles 1010!, Merged!, Six!, Bounzy!, Merge Town!, Merge Farm!, and Paint Tower!

Optimized for Tablets. No Internet connection required.
developerAddress: 100 Cambridge Grove, The Aircraft Factory, London W6 0LE, United Kingdom

comments: This game is very polished.  Beautiful console quality graphics and smooth gameplay designed to work well on mobile.  The voice acting is excellent and the gameplay fun and engaging.  The only issue i have is the stamina system.   Only being allowed to play 5 duels then wait over 2 hours is stupid.  Why would i want to spend money on getting cards for it if i cannot use them more?

Changed to 1 star because my data has been erased TWICE now. First time I got a new phone and it wouldn't let me transfer over my data with my konami id. Fine. I was missed but not that pissed. I start a new game, get kinda into it, open my app the next day, and my data is gone AGAIN!!! Not uninstalling because I do genuinely LOVE this game, but y'all gotta do something about this. I'm not playing this game again until I get my data back.

this truly an amazing game, there's really only a couple of things, why reduce the monster and spell/trap zones to only 3 cards? I wouldn't say it's bad, I just don't see why you'd need to do it.. plus the average deck size of yugioh is between 40 and 50 cards, why limit us to only a max of 30 cards? (not including the 5 for extra  decks) but all in all its a great game! Finally got my six samurai deck!üòÑ also, I think it'd be an awesome idea to put in a way for duelists to redeem the codes on the cards they've purchased IRL. I bet that'd get even more duelists to play! Just a thought thoughüòä

My app is not opening. I love this game wish you have have out more different cards in the packs. I would like to see swords of reveling light. A bunch of rare magic and trap cards. You should not be able to use Odion's chain reaction duel sense in the PvP duels.

Found Yu-Gi-Oh on Netflix last week and decided to rewatch it. A few episodes in, and my love for the show rekindled, I got eager to play the game myself. I used to play with Yu-Go-Oh cards when I was a kid but it's been about 12 years since then and so all my old cards are in the loft, not that I know anyone IRL anymore who would fancy a game anyway, and not accessible right now... plus I had forgotten most of the rules too. But this app is just what I was looking for: a way to relearn the rules and have a bit of fun. Perfect for whatever skill level you're at with the game!

Needs to seperate GX from the original but unfair if you only know the original and you screwed in PvP by cards you've never even seen or heard of before.. plus why do the AI's get cards that we cannot even obtain?? Pretty unfair. Ill change my rating once this is fixed.
description: Battle monsters, other Duelists and collect battle cards in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links, the fighting card game straight from the TV show!Online multiplayer games meet card battles in the Yu-Gi-Oh! card game. Collect cards to build your battle Deck and fight other Duelists online to see who is the Dueling Master! Enjoy voices from the anime and heighten the Dueling experience![FEATURES]Fighting Card Games- Battle other Duelists and their special battle Decks- Intuitive controls for beginners! Depth to satisfy "Yu-Gi-Oh!" veterans!- Build your Deck to become the most powerful Dueling Master, with monsters like "Dark Magician" and "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"- Strategic gameplay makes you decide which card comes out next!- Duel with your favorite characters from the Yu-Gi-Oh! world and complete Stage missionsOnline Multiplayer Battles- Fight Legendary Duelists from the show like Yugi, Kaiba, Joey, and Mai! - Multiplayer games force you to find your opponents weakness and strategize- PVP battles pit you against players from around the world! Climb through the rankings and take your place as the Duel World King!Card Battle Deck- Collect cards and form the most powerful Deck for battle!- Build your ultimate Deck and aim for the top- Use the cards that you collect in-game to build and edit your trusty Deck to take on opponents!- Shop for cards in the game store!Stay tuned for future card additions![ABOUT "Yu-Gi-Oh!"]"Yu-Gi-Oh!" is a popular manga created by Kazuki Takahashi that was serialized in SHUEISHA Inc.'s "WEEKLY SHONEN JUMP" since 1996. Konami Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. provides a Trading Card Game (TCG) and console games, based on "Yu-Gi-Oh!" created from the original manga, that are enjoyed around the world.[Supported OS]Android 4.4 and above
descriptionHTML:
Battle monsters, other Duelists and collect battle cards in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links, the fighting card game straight from the TV show!

Online multiplayer games meet card battles in the Yu-Gi-Oh! card game. Collect cards to build your battle Deck and fight other Duelists online to see who is the Dueling Master! Enjoy voices from the anime and heighten the Dueling experience!


[FEATURES]

Fighting Card Games
- Battle other Duelists and their special battle Decks
- Intuitive controls for beginners! Depth to satisfy "Yu-Gi-Oh!" veterans!
- Build your Deck to become the most powerful Dueling Master, with monsters like "Dark Magician" and "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"
- Strategic gameplay makes you decide which card comes out next!
- Duel with your favorite characters from the Yu-Gi-Oh! world and complete Stage missions

Online Multiplayer Battles
- Fight Legendary Duelists from the show like Yugi, Kaiba, Joey, and Mai!
- Multiplayer games force you to find your opponents weakness and strategize
- PVP battles pit you against players from around the world! Climb through the rankings and take your place as the Duel World King!

Card Battle Deck
- Collect cards and form the most powerful Deck for battle!
- Build your ultimate Deck and aim for the top
- Use the cards that you collect in-game to build and edit your trusty Deck to take on opponents!
- Shop for cards in the game store!
Stay tuned for future card additions!

[ABOUT "Yu-Gi-Oh!"]
"Yu-Gi-Oh!" is a popular manga created by Kazuki Takahashi that was serialized in SHUEISHA Inc.'s "WEEKLY SHONEN JUMP" since 1996. Konami Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. provides a Trading Card Game (TCG) and console games, based on "Yu-Gi-Oh!" created from the original manga, that are enjoyed around the world.

[Supported OS]
Android 4.4 and above
