comments: Simply wonderful app!! My daughter's speech is delayed and I introduced this to her at 17months. By 20months, we were hearing her sounding out the letters after it's repeated in the app and she has learnt to choose the correct letter when asked by the app. She couldn't get enough of it! Now we've moved on to shapes and colours that she's working through now at 22months. It's truly amazing. Thank u for no ads. Beautiful graphics. No issues with touch or connecting. Would love British English version tho where 'Z' sounds out as 'Zed.'

I absolutely love this app! My child has learnt so much from this along with all the other apps similar as well. There are no adds which is very much appreciated with a 3 year old that will click on anything. I would recommend to anyone!!
Please check shape matching. My son got little confused between pentagon and hexagon because in app it is telling pentagon shape as hexagon. Might be I am wrong.
I am impressed with this easy to use yet challenging app. My 18 month old daughter has learned all of her letters and their sounds.  I would recommend this free no ads app to any parent.

2 year old loves this! She already knew all her letters, I'm so glad that I found this fun way to take her to the next step!!! My only suggestion is that it would be really cool if the praise word for completing a letter started with the same letter. For instance, when they write "A" the congratulatory word could be "Amazing", "B" is "Bravo", "F" is "Fantastic", etc.
The trace should b continuous. Stoping and joining the Trace is not good. It should with flow. Will uninstall if not updated.
description: Looking for a fun, free, and simple educational app to help your toddler learn phonics and trace letters of the alphabet? Look no further than ABC Kids.ABC Kids is a free phonics and alphabet teaching app that makes learning fun for children, from toddlers all the way to preschoolers and kindergartners. It features a series of tracing games to help kids recognize letter shapes, associate them with phonic sounds, and put their alphabet knowledge to use in fun matching exercises. Any toddler, kindergartener or preschool age child can learn English and the English alphabet simply by following the arrows with their finger. They can even collect stickers and toys as they complete tracing games!ABC Kids is more than just a kid-friendly educational app, it was designed with adult participation in mind, too. The interface keeps toddlers focused on alphabet reading and writing, tucking menu commands away from moving fingers. Adults can easily access settings to engage Teacher Mode, look at report cards, or toggle tracing and phonics games to better facilitate learning.Best of all, ABC Kids is full-featured and free from in-app purchases and third party advertisements. Toddlers and adults can enjoy learning together without interruption.Features:- A colorful early education app that helps children learn the English alphabet.- Includes ABC tracing games, phonics pairing, letter matching, and more.- Uppercase and lowercase letters to trace, listen to, and match.- Smart interface helps kids focus on phonics and letters without accidentally exiting the game.- No third party ads, no in-app purchases, no tricks. Just pure educational fun!Note to Parents:When creating ABC Kids, we wanted to build the best experience possible for both adults and for children. We're parents ourselves, and we know how paywalls, in-app purchases, and intrusive third party advertisements can detract from the learning experience. With ABC Kids, we put the features of a paid app into a preschool friendly package, leaving out frustrating pop-ups and microtransactions. The end result is exactly the educational experience we want for our children. We think you and your family will enjoy it, too!- Best wishes from the parents at RV AppStudios
descriptionHTML:
Looking for a fun, free, and simple educational app to help your toddler learn phonics and trace letters of the alphabet? Look no further than ABC Kids.

ABC Kids is a free phonics and alphabet teaching app that makes learning fun for children, from toddlers all the way to preschoolers and kindergartners. It features a series of tracing games to help kids recognize letter shapes, associate them with phonic sounds, and put their alphabet knowledge to use in fun matching exercises. Any toddler, kindergartener or preschool age child can learn English and the English alphabet simply by following the arrows with their finger. They can even collect stickers and toys as they complete tracing games!

ABC Kids is more than just a kid-friendly educational app, it was designed with adult participation in mind, too. The interface keeps toddlers focused on alphabet reading and writing, tucking menu commands away from moving fingers. Adults can easily access settings to engage Teacher Mode, look at report cards, or toggle tracing and phonics games to better facilitate learning.

Best of all, ABC Kids is full-featured and free from in-app purchases and third party advertisements. Toddlers and adults can enjoy learning together without interruption.

Features:
- A colorful early education app that helps children learn the English alphabet.
- Includes ABC tracing games, phonics pairing, letter matching, and more.
- Uppercase and lowercase letters to trace, listen to, and match.
- Smart interface helps kids focus on phonics and letters without accidentally exiting the game.
- No third party ads, no in-app purchases, no tricks. Just pure educational fun!

Note to Parents:
When creating ABC Kids, we wanted to build the best experience possible for both adults and for children. We're parents ourselves, and we know how paywalls, in-app purchases, and intrusive third party advertisements can detract from the learning experience. With ABC Kids, we put the features of a paid app into a preschool friendly package, leaving out frustrating pop-ups and microtransactions. The end result is exactly the educational experience we want for our children. We think you and your family will enjoy it, too!

- Best wishes from the parents at RV AppStudios

Las Vegas, NV 89107
recentChanges: Ready to help your children learn while having fun? ABC Kids makes it easy to train their brains and learn the ABCs through a wide variety of mini-games, all for FREE! Colorful graphics, collectible stickers, and lots of puzzles to solve, all without in-app purchases or third party ads.
Our latest update to ABC Kids features numerous bug fixes and performance improvements designed to make it easier for children to learn while playing. Download now and let the education begin!

descriptionHTML:
One Line with One Touch is a simple way to get some brain training exercise everyday. This is a great mind challenging game with simple rules. Just try to connect all the dots with only one touch.

In this tricky mind game you will find a lot of good brain puzzle packs and a daily challenge.

Just a couple of minutes a day with this mind game will help you activate your brain. Enjoy this brain training game at home or at work, at a park or in a bus, in other words everywhere!

This One Line with One Touch game doesn’t occupy a lot of space on your device and it doesn’t drain your battery!

In One Line with One Touch you will find:

comments: Here I am like many others, unable to get into my game after update. Was level 53, recently earned the Chinese dog and had lots of upgrades to my farm. I would have been excited about the upcoming birthday event if I could access my game. Fix soon or I will delete this and all other zynga games I funnel my hard working money into

Don't do any updates. 5 hours ago my game was fine. I tried to sign in now and just get grassy area with flowers and no buildings or animals. No little cog to get to ID # so can't submit ticket to get help. Zynga took money I spent on keys and I have no game now. Looks like Zynga doesn't care

Great game, love achieving all the quests, also love the show animals, I wish I could do more than one with a partner though. I wish that during an update that it wouldn't stop the game for the players, showing grassy area with no coins or keys and level 1, so I could continue to play. But I know I just have to leave it for a while and wait till the update is finished, which is hard because it is so addictive. Some people need to remember though that this is a free game.

I had members of my co op losing their game after upgrade so I had decided I wouldn't but that was not an option. You either upgraded or you couldn't play. So now I too have lost everything and just see grass. I worked hard and spent a lot of cash on keys. I am so pissed right now. They need to fix this because I am not starting over!!

Long time player, never any issues until now! Latest update is hopeless, half way over lvl 87, $32m in coins & thousands of keys. Game frozen, sitting on lvl 1 & shows grassy area like all other reviews. Cant get into settings to log a ticket. NOT HAPPY!!

When and if ever the bugs get worked out it will be a great game.  The chat issues are ridiculous and getting into global and the market are impossible. The spinning sun of death gets old fast. Upgrades seem to make items disappear.

descriptionHTML:
**App Store Best of 2014**
Escape to the world of farming, friends and fun! Go on farm adventures to collect rare goods and craft new recipes. Raise animals and grow your farm with friends. Join a farm Co-Op to trade and share or play on your own in Anonymous Mode. You can play FarmVille anytime, anywhere… even when not connected to the internet. Best of all, the world’s most popular farming game is free to play!
** ”FarmVille is back and this time, it’s portable!” – TIME **
** “”Officially not just for Facebook anymore”” – Los Angeles Times **
** “” They may have built the best FarmVille game of the series”” – Kotaku **
- CRAFT a variety of baked gourmet goods like classic country apple pies
- HARVEST farm fresh crops of your favorite fruits and vegetables
- CUSTOMIZE your own farm for charming country living
- COLLECT hidden and rare items as you discover a new coastal farm
- NURTURE and raise a wide variety of adorable animals like your very own farm dog
- EXPLORE a new FarmVille story filled with special farm adventures
- BUILD a lush family farm by the coast so all your friends can visit
- FISH with your fellow farmers and sell your catch at Pike’s Landing
- GARDEN by the beautiful blue ocean as you decorate your farm with flowers and fresh produce
- TRADE and chat with friends or play anonymously with people from all over the world
- ESCAPE to the coast then connect to your Facebook farm to send free water
- EARN daily rewards with the Mystery Chest and take a spin at the Prize Wheel”
Additional information:
• The game is free to play; however, in-app purchases are available for additional content and in-game currency. In-app purchases range from $0.99 to $199.99 USD.
• Use of this application is governed by Zynga’s Terms of Service, found at www.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service.
• For information about how Zynga uses personal data, please read our privacy policy at http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.

description: Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.
descriptionHTML:
Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.

Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?

Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?

Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?

Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...

Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.

InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.

comments: Excellent game! I have no doubt that the game is one of the most perfect games. Everything but one thing. I just ran one race that comes with the actualization and I won around 5k, te first upgrade for the camaro Nascar costs around 130k does that even make sense. In the real life if you spend that money to make a competitive car to win that money... I hope you get my meaning

Good game, good graphics,good sound. I like that it is on going, not like some similar games. I found it fairly easy to get used too. Plenty of choices and cars. I like that you are not constantly forced to spend real money in order to progress. That is a big plus for us game players. Well done all at EA, you have a real winner with this game. I personally am loving playing this game. Update, I have been playing for a few days now, the only drawback I have noticed is, the game takes up a lot of space on my device. Having said that, its so good its worth it. As previously, well done all at EA.

The MOST AMAZING racing game in the mobile device. The gameplay, graphics, and the controls were perfect. Also, the tracks in the game were so real like I was racing in real life. I also loves the cars that were added in this game, it looks so amazing. But, what I like the most from this game was online real-time racing. There were no other racing games that has this feature. Just have suggestions, add custom race mode. In this mode, you can chose tracks, daytime, amount of opponents, and also the laps. And also enable to invite friends to custom race mode. Also, probably adding weather system will be better. Last, make the cars could do rev-bombing. So, at the start of the races, you could have some pretty good start. Although, keep it up Electronic Arts & Fire Monkeys. Hopefully, these suggestions could help the game become much better and better.

Well,to start off, game really speaks for itself.Everything is pretty dope. I'm just going to name some things that I'm sure most of the people wants. -Dynamic weather conditions,how amazing snow day on Bathurst would be?Rain,wind,foggy... -Breakable parts, mirrors, spoilers,even wheels,and those should be on the tarmac whole race. -Drift events, I'm just going to say,we all want it. -More hatchbacks definitely,and more cars like its Jeep,or Ford Raptor,and you can add unique cars from movies,etc. -And sprint events,point to point.How fun is that. -More mountains!!! Please. Peace!

It's a great game where you can race and customise your own car. However here are some ideas I would like you the imlament please  1. If the cars from the NASCAR can get the custmizeing like all the others.   2. To extend the custmize can yo add a tab where you can put spoilers, air intakes And other things you would put on a car.  3. Finally to make this game real racing 3 if when a race of just go to see all the car you have.  There be a "i" button that will give the player real information about the car the player is looking at.

Absolutely amazing game!!! I'm a huge petrol head and this ticks all boxes considering it's a phone game. Love the controls. Personally i use accelerator on right, brake on left and tilt to turn. Feels bang on. Graphics top notch. No need to spend money to progress. Literally one downfall... upgrade costs when you get higher spec cars. Apart from that... GOOD JOB!!!

descriptionHTML:
**#1 Top Free App in over 100 countries**

Real Racing 3 is the award-winning franchise that sets a new standard for mobile racing games – you have to play it to believe it.

This app offers in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings.

Over 200 Million Downloads!

TabbyAwards 2014 – WINNER: Best Action, Adventure, Arcade & Racing Game
Mobile Excellence Awards – WINNER: Best Mobile Game 2013
Game Connect Asia Pacific – WINNER: Game of The Year 2013, Technical Excellence, Excellence in Art
Meffy Awards – FINALIST: Best Mobile Game 2013

Real Racing 3 features an ever-expanding roster of officially licensed tracks with 39 circuits at 17 real-world locations, a 43-car grid and over 140 meticulously detailed cars from top manufacturers. Plus Real-Time Multiplayer, Social Leaderboards, Time Trials, night racing, and innovative Time Shifted Multiplayer™ (TSM) technology, allowing you to race anyone, anytime, anywhere.

**This is a resource-intensive game featuring extremely high quality visuals. Please make sure you have at least 1.5GB of free space on your device.**

PRAISE FOR REAL RACING 3
“Feels a full generation ahead of the competition” (IGN, 9.1/10, Editors’ Choice)
“A stunning visual masterpiece on mobile” (Touch Arcade)
“Sets the new standard on mobile for racing games” (Pocket Gamer, 9/10, Gold Award)

REAL CARS
Take the wheel of over 140 intensely detailed vehicles from iconic manufacturers like Ford, Ferrari, Lamborghini, Aston Martin and Mercedes-Benz and test your skills on an authentic 43-car race grid – the most epic racing experience on any handheld.

REAL TRACKS
Burn rubber on a full lineup of 17 real tracks in multiple configurations from top worldwide locations, including Silverstone, Hockenheimring, Le Mans, Dubai Autodrome and many more.

REAL PEOPLE
Go bumper to bumper with friends and rivals in global 8-player, cross-platform, real-time racing with drafting. Or drop into any race to challenge their AI-controlled versions in Time-Shifted Multiplayer™.

MORE CHOICES THAN EVER
Compete in over 4,000 events including Cup races, Eliminations and Endurance challenges. Choose from a wide range of upgrades to maximize your car’s performance. Customize your car with a huge collection of paints, vinyls and rims. View the action from a variety of camera angles, tweak the HUD and fine-tune the controls to your personal preference.

THE PREMIER RACING EXPERIENCE
Powered by the remarkable Mint™ 3 Engine, Real Racing 3 features detailed car damage, fully functioning rear view mirrors, and dynamic reflections for truly HD racing. Enjoy a rich, next-gen game with the most advanced cross-platform social and competitive racing community ever. Real Racing 3 delivers it all and pushes the boundaries with every update.

Welcome to the definitive racing experience.

comments: I was really surprised to find that the first nite I played, 4 hours past before I even knew it!! The gameplay is detailed jobs you choke do.  Not the Teamany many things to do and also KILL ZOMBIES. Controls are very easy., and you figure out more things thatr fun. The Music plays in background is a cool little Duddie! If you enjoy a relaxabole Zombie Day of Double Taps!

Game is easy to control and the ability to change the controls to suite user preference is really a plus.  Spanky bars are hard to get and that should be looked into. Weapon upgrades are right in line with where they should be as far as cost and time. New weapons seem to be a little expensive.  Overall . . . Good game and good time playing !

descriptionHTML:
Zombie Hunter is one of the best free zombie games ever! Get ready to survive the zombie apocalypse in the ultimate first person shooter sniper game. Take your gun, aim to the head and kill the undead with headshots to stop the deadly plague virus infection. You are the only one capable to stop living dead waves, destroy the zombie tsunami horde, survive and save humanity! Do you think you can do it? Try this zombie survival game and survive undead becoming a real zombie hunter! Stunning 3D graphics, action and tons of shooting are waiting for you!

The Zombie Apocalypse has just begun. A virus pandemic is spreading over the world, and people are starting to mutate into some kind of walking dead. Humanity is in danger, and you have been called to help survivors by killing the zombie outbreak. Travel to Dead Zone, take your rifle and try your sniper skills shooting the unkilled! You will need strategy, precision and cold blood to stop the zombie assault in this action shooter game. Survival is the only way. Keep your finger on the trigger and make headshots to every living dead!

★ Download Zombie Hunter, the best free zombie shooter game, and start killing living deads right now! Become the ultimate combat killer and end the plague virus infection! ★


SHOOT ZOMBIES; STOP VIRUS PANDEMIC
In Zombie Hunter you are a sniper that must save humanity from a zombie outbreak. Hundreds of civilians are waiting to be saved! Kill zombies before they can reach people. You must be quick in this 3D action survival game full of undead enemies!

SEVERAL GAME MODES
Shoot zombies hordes from a helicopter, defeat zombie bosses in special missions, play as a zombie instead as a survivor, use dogs to help you to find treasures and kill enemies, aim from a rooftop… You have many ways to play Zombie Hunter!

TENS OF MISSIONS AND MAPS
Infested City, Abandoned Theme Park, Dead Port, Arctic… Travel to each Dead Zone and kill your zombie enemies through tens of funny missions. Take your sniper rifle and shoot every walking dead. Aim and make a headshot in this 3D undead shooter game!

DOZENS OF WEAPONS TO UPGRADE
Do you prefer sniper rifles, assault rifles, bazookas or machine guns? Choose your favorite and upgrade them! They can be more powerful and faster, which is very useful when you are fighting a living dead army. It will be easier to make headshots in the game!

STUNNING 3D GRAPHICS
Zombies are more real than ever! You will be impressed by graphics, new gameplay and immersive soundtrack. Environments are detailed and bullet time will enchant you! Zombie Hunter is the best zombie apocalypse game with FPS and action elements!

GET POWERUPS!
You can use several power ups to help you in combat. Improve your aim, stop the time, get extra energy… You will need some of them if you want to kill all zombies with headshots! Because the more headshots you make, the more money you win!

PLAY OFFLINE OR ONLINE!
Don’t you have internet connection? No wifi around you? No worries! You can play this zombie game online or offline, which means you can enjoy every part of Zombie Hunter without being connected to the net. Isn’t it wonderful?


Mankind needs you to stop the undead plague infection! Zombies are searching for brains and you are the only one who can destroy them. Will you end the living dead z war killing them all? Take your sniper rifle and bullets, call your dog, go to the Dead Zone and prepare to fight against the forces of evil! Hunting zombies have never been so funny!

If you like First Person Shooter (FPS games), zombie survival games, sniper games and strategy war games, you will enjoy Zombie Hunter! It’s fun, challenging and has a very intense and innovative gameplay that surely you will enjoy. Join the Zombie Hunter army and start shooting every walking dead in the ultimate zombie sniper game! Long live to living dead!

comments: One of the most addictive games i've played. My only issue is the firing rate of the main pistol,it's way too slow to survive 3 or even 2 enemies rushing you. Should make main pistol upgradable to at least increase firing rate to give u a fighting chance especially when u run out of ammo from the mini gun or saw because at that point there are too many bad guys ,and while upgrading the pistol,render a compensator or extended mag,filipinos would love that ish. Bottom line is ur progress after the first boss depends on premium weapons and they dont come fast enough,because the pistol is pretty much useless when there's 2 bad guys on the screen,and absolutely useless when there are 3 or more.

comments: I am totally addicted to this app. I have never actually spent money on a app before this one. I just wish the passes that you buy would also regenerate. Also wish you got more than one gem at the end of each episode. It takes a really long time to get those up when you don't have the money on a card to buy more. Just a suggestion. This is the only "game" app I use anymore I have a ton of games downloaded on my phone and I only mess with this one.

I love it, but some stories are very inappropriate.Also story's don't really get new chapters quick enough because I go through them so fast. It truly is an amazing app that is so addicting. Good Luck on not being able to control yourself. Also, tickets don't replinnesh quick enough. Sorry about spelling.

It's such an amazing app but you need to know how to find good stories. I spend my time "reading" the stories and it annoys me when my passes run out but thank God because if not I would never leave my phone. One of my favourite apps ever

I hate how it advertises that you get to choose your story but everything takes so many gems. Why? I know you need to make money somehow but you only get 1 gem per chapter and each story takes at least 50 gems if you want to choose the good choices. Very disappointed. Also when I first played this game you got 5 free passes and now it's only 2. What the hell!

This app is amazing. I have been trying to find an app like this and finally I found it. I love how you can just sign up for free and create your own story's without using money. This app is a dream come true to me. I've had it for a year now and it is still my favorite app. It's like a game of life. 5 stars for You!

I LOVE THIS GAME!! currently writing my own on the app!! Love that update‚ô° definitely my favourite app ever!! Only an add at the start of story witch is grandüëåOnly bad thing is you have to wait a long Time for passes to refill &  some choices cost way to much! .defo download now!!

comments: I have been playing this game since it's debut as Vainglory, and I have been happy about how the devs always consider what the players want. For what seems like forever the only problem I have been facing with the game is it's neer ending update system. Each update has 1GB and up in the PS, update after update it's always a 1GB update. When otg her games have minimal mb updates, but also have 1gb updates only when it's a major update. An overhaul as you might say. Anyway. The game is lag free for me, and the network connection is very stable now compared as to when it started.

Its a great game on its own. Graphics are so good, controls are butter smooth. One issue I have is that they took away guild chat. Its also not possible to ask players for a game while said player is mid game anymore. I know semc is trying to keep communications to a minimum but..these changes make it hard for any sort of teaming. Unless you and your guild mates just so happen to be online AND not in a game. Would really like these back honestly.

Dear Developer,  Hello there, Please Help me. Event with New update i still cant play on 5vs5 mode bot or casual. Please help to fix it, as your recomend setting im playing on low and still have forceclose issue after loading screen & back restart the app. Im using Samsung Galaxy Note Edge. descriptionHTML:
Join with friends or go solo in this breathtaking free-to-play, real-time PvP MOBA filled with dragons, epic heroes and a global community of allies ready to fight by your side. Super Evil Megacorp’s Vainglory 5V5 is the only “no-compromises” MOBA on mobile, providing to players superior gameplay and strategic depth, the most accurate and responsive controls and the best graphics and highest frame rates on mobile.

Sound intense? Only if you want it to be. Have fun your way with casual and competitive experiences ranging from 5-minute BRAWLs to the full 5V5 battle arena experience.

At Super Evil, we believe every phone is a portable next-gen console, and that every mobile player deserves games just as core, strategic and performant as players on PC. Experience the most powerful game engine on the platform — and the most fun you’ve ever had playing on a mobile device.

If your current game was dumbed down for a mobile audience, you deserve better. Never settle for the lesser evil.

THE CATEGORY-DEFINING 5V5 MOBA FOR MOBILE:

- Real line-of-sight Fog of War
- 120 FPS pro-motion support
- Skill-based play & decision-making
- Macro & rotational strategies
- Objective-rich 3-lane map
- Free Camera
- Last-hitting
- Wave Control
- Lane Teleports
- Active items
- Intricate vision system
- Original fantasy characters and storytelling

Vainglory 5V5 is the first and only true MOBA on the mobile platform.

----------------------

"This is one of the best multiplayer experiences on mobile.Vainglory is a totally legit MOBA experience, available any time in the palm of your hand." —IGN

“Best Mobile Game” —2016 Global Mobile Awards

“Some of the best visuals seen on the App Store.” —Macworld UK

----------------------

Features:

== Casual, Ranked and BRAWL Modes ==
Vainglory offers real-time MOBA combat with and against bots or live players. Whether you’re ranking up with your guild or just just have time for five minutes of fun, Vainglory has the gameplay style for you.

== 37+ Playable Heroes & Unlockable skins ==
Master heroes across a variety of themes and playstyles. Make unforgettable plays as a high-damage carry. Attack from the shadows as a menacing jungler. Soak up damage and save your friends as a front-line captain. However you like to play, Vainglory has unique, captivating heroes you’ll love — along with a hunt for skins you can earn through play without spending any money.

== Touch Controls & E.V.I.L Engine Designed for Mobile ==
Designed exclusively for mobile, Vainglory’s game engine is made for jaw-dropping teamfight battles running as high as 120 frames per second. Instead of janky and imprecise joystick controls where you can’t select the target, Vainglory’s pinpoint, sub-30ms touch controls offer the responsiveness and autonomy you need to win. And because everything is just a tap, you’ll attack, move and use spellbinding hero abilities with ease.

== Guilds & Teams ==
Need someone to play with? Vainglory’s built-in Guild Finder makes finding a team at your skill level simple. Create a team to climb ranks as a group or party up with your Guild to have fun and earn more rewards.

== Chests & Quests ==
Every time you play Vainglory, you make progress and collect loot you can use to open chests, unlock skins and hero talents and more. And if you’re lucky, you’ll hit one of the many massive jackpots.

== World-renowned International Mobile Esport ==
Watch and learn from the pros and enjoy some of the best matches you’ve ever seen — and if you’re the best of the best, travel the world and compete for massive prize pools!

== Vibrant Community ==
Vainglory is a global community in 14 different languages that thrives on the support of active players.

----------------------

Please fix the error of freezing of the game,  its irritating actually.  I spend alot of time and expect of smooth gaming exp.  -_- When can you fix this manner?  Idont know if my andriod phone is not capable of this game or what???

i want to report, looks like theres a bug. i reset my envoy path and when i choosed the new one then it wont selected when i press confirm, it went back to points again. second, i have a connection issue, i always suddenly got stuck at the game that forced me to reset my connection. fyi, im using a good wifi connection tho, but still got stuck. thats it, overall its fine for me. thank you x-legend team.

It's a wonderful design MMORPG and the storylines is very good with the cutscenes. The pet/eidolon system is very attractive and interactive. What's creative is the job system where you can pick two jobs(later on at level 45 i believe). What's bugging me is that most of the time i'm just clicking a button and it brings me to where i want to go. It's not a bad thing but it's a mobile game and i accept this trait of a mobile game. But what i would like to commend is the stat system. I remember during the pc version i could decide whether i want my characther to have fast cooldown or stronger defend. But overall, i'm expecting more wonderful development from the development team. It's your first day, keep up the good work x-legend and thank you for bringing this game to mobile.

Is there no voice acting in the game's cutscenes or did I miss something? Also, I thought it'll have Japanese voices, since the opening, the one where a guy and a girl from real world is there, have Japanese voices. Can I make the cutscenes play the voices? Preferably in Japanese, please. Thnks in advance.

descriptionHTML:
ACHIEVEMENTS
● Recommended by Google Play in many countries
● 18 million downloads for Aura Kingdom Online worldwide!
● Addictive gameplay with visually stunning graphics and animation effects

BACKGROUND
Come and venture into this massive Aura Kingdom world, a classic online game transformed into mobile platform.

In Aura Kingdom, players become Envoys who were summoned by the Goddess of Creation, Gaia. To fight the dark power and protect the world “Azuria”, players must stand together, and collect powerful Eidolons to save the world.
Sky Tower, the ultimate challenge of all; numerous bosses await you to conquer, fight your way up to the 100 epic levels.

CLASSIC FEATURES
● Easy to manipulate: designed to be easy for everyone to pick up.
● Summon over 100 heroes called Eidolons to assemble your ultimate troop, and save the world from eternal darkness. Also, you will find the interaction with them makes your day.
● Sky tower 100 levels: Real-time battles with those fearsome guardian bosses in Sky Tower. Team-up with guild members and win incredible rewards in return.
● Exciting Battles to challenge: 1 vs 1 arena, Tag Team Tournament, Raid Instances, GVG Tournament Duels and various PVE trial instances.
● Hundreds of gorgeous outfits and styles to choose from. Japanese style, Western fantasy, sportswear and daily fashion keeps players up with new trends. Costume Archive system offers players not only excitement but also a way to enhance power.
● Multiple fun for character stats boost: Envoy’s Path for passive skill abilities, Mounts Refinement, Eidolon Collection, Card Collection and Card Battles.
● Other interesting features like Fishing, Cooking, Mining and Treasure Hunt and more!

Contact us here:
● Official Site :
https://www.x-legend.com/aurakingdom
● Facebook :
https://www.facebook.com/AuraKingdomM/
● Twitter :
https://twitter.com/aurakingdomm

《System Requirements for Android》
Processor: SnapDragon 800, or faster processor
RAM: 2G or more
Operating system: Android 4.4 or later
Storage: 2 GB recommended

Love this game! It's challenging, addictive and beautifully developed both visually and audibly.My complaints would be:   *Certain aspects of the game are not clear, with nowhere to reference. So certain occurrences just seem incidental and therefore don't allow you to fully strategize.   *There are no written rules or explanations to refer to. Additionslly, the game is not customizable. I was just assigned a random avatar (which I don't like) which doesn't appear adjustable.  *It also used my real name to identify in the game, even though I had already created one before registering to King Games. Worse, there seems to be no way to change this either.  If there is a way already developed to address these issues, please help!

descriptionHTML:
Match your way through a cascade of bee-autiful garden levels in Blossom Blast Saga, a fun linker game from the makers of Candy Crush Saga and Farm Heroes Saga! Link flower buds of the same colors to make beautiful flowers blossom, and clear the flowerbeds before you run out of moves!

Match 3 or more flower buds to make the world bloom into spectacular colors. Connect more flower buds to set off a glorious chain-reaction and watch your score grow! Collect every flower and make your way through gorgeous garden levels in this colorful adventure game!

Blossom Blast Saga features:

Connect Flower Buds to make them grow
• Fun game with simple, casual gameplay that’s easy to learn but challenging to master
• Link flower buds in beautiful gardens filled with colorful graphics
• Connect 3 or more flower buds of the same color to link and grow your flowers
• Connect flowerbeds to get 'Awesome Blossom!' and ‘Flower Power’ game assists

Match and Link in a Colorful Puzzle Game
• Match and link beautiful flowers in over 600 colorful levels
• Blossom flowers in beautiful garden levels like Dreamy Meadow, Carnival Garden and beyond

4 Puzzle Modes
• Collect Flowers Mode: Connect flowers of certain colors in a sequence
• Bloom in Scoring Mode: Match 3 of the same colorful flowers to gain points
• Remove Weeds Mode: Link flowers surrounding weeds to remove them from the garden
• Big Flower Bud Mode: Link bigger flower buds with other flowers, or blossom nearby flowers

Collect Flowers with Friends and Follow Their Progress
• Connect to the Blossom Blast Saga leaderboards to watch your friends’ status
• Link your game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the internet

Match your way through luscious garden stages, link beautiful flowers and connect with friends to share your experience. Play Blossom Blast Saga, the fun linker game where you collect beautiful flowers!

comments: I love this game. Its very addicting and fun, but I find that there are barely any female dragons. This upsets me very much and I would like for this to change. The only females I see are the dragons with names like  motherly dragon, belle dragon, viktoria dragons, and sleeping beauty dragons. There are also descriptions like "add some girly pink to your collections with the gummy dragon"(which is also coincidently a girl). Then I see cool legendary dragons, but OH plot twist they're all boys. This is a very fun game no doubt on that, but please, stop with the sexism and make cool female dragons. Thank you.

Just a few gripes. 1st of all I LOVE DRAGON CITY. Been playing for years. About your survey, I would never. You ask for too many permissions. Tree of life....when I get a Dragon here comes the same Dragon adding up for hatching. Like why? 815+ dragons are more than enough. Why do u keep adding, adding, adding. We could NEVER get all of them as it is. Why more? Love me some Dragon City like a said in the beginning.

This is #8 for Top Grossing Simulation and you can see in the game that they are trying everything they can to take the #1 spot.  During events they have a unique currency, if you spend real money on that currency and don't use it you're SOL. They don't compensate you by turning it into the next events currency.  Breeding and Hatching eggs takes enormous amounts of time be cause they want you to spend money to speed it up. (The rare the dragon the more tine it takes to breed and hatch, like 10-45hrs from what I've had).  Lastly only get 2 of 5 island, you have to SLOWLY save up crystal or pay real money to unlock them, islands fill up quick. You can youse the free gold but you better have a lot of Facebook friends playing as well or you can't unlock them

I feel that this is a fun and addictive game with lots of potential.. p However , please make quest battles in the arena longer , I was at the last battle but couldn't play it , because it's time was too short . 2 days is not alot, even if I play like 3 times or more a day.

It's a really good game, but just one problem:  there's that island that uses grid coins, and everytime Deus says " this island has a special currency:Grid coins" , it kicks me out of the game. Only when I go into that island and press 'ok' , it kicks me out. Please, Please, PLEASE fix it! I love playing dragon city and monster legends. :(

I really like the game as it relaxes me but there are some issues. Certain videos will restart my game and then I lose the rewards. The puppy video is the worst. The extra islands are OK when you get enough coins to really play them and the battles need work. I don't know how I can win if I am a level 20 and I have to battle a level 30 or higher. I hope some fixes are coming.

descriptionHTML:
Ready to take on the hottest role playing game out there and bend fire-breathing dragons to your will? Are you the one to claim the title of top Dragon Master in the world? Accept the challenge and prove your might!

Build a Dragon City on floating Islands and fill it with farms, habitats, buildings… and dragons! Collect and train your cute babies and evolve them into impressive beasts that will defend you in the PvP Arenas!

Join forces with other Dragon Masters in Alliances, interact in the chat and obtain rewards from the Alliance Chest.

Combine dragons of Fire, Nature, War, Legend and lots of other elements to hatch rare hybrids and expand your collection. You can also obtain dragons from exclusive events!

FEATURES

- Complete the Dragon Book! There are over 500 dragons to breed and collect.
- New dragons join the game every week through breeding events and special islands.
- Challenge yourself at the Dragon Quests and fight against other Masters in the PvP Arenas to collect exclusive dragons, claim Warrior’s Chests, and climb up the leaderboards!
- Summon dragons of the at the Tree Of Life and try their skills.
- Unlock advanced features like the Ancient World and the Guardian Dragons.
- Be social: Join Alliances to play with other masters, chat with them, and open Alliance Chests.
- Log in with Facebook to save your game and play on all your devices - That way you can take your baby dragons everywhere.

There are over 80 million Dragon Masters. What are you waiting for? Join the fun!

If you already love our dragons… Drop us a nice review :)

Dragon City is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

Follow us on Twitter: @DragonCityGame
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DragonCity
Subscribe to our Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/DragonCityChannel

Check out other cool games by the creators of Dragon City: Monster Legends and World Chef!

When crossing finish line game keeps playing and doesn't finish, time runs out and you've lost. Please fix

To test is on lvl 1 first corner accelerate and turn left (any set of controls tried all) it will start turning right seems to be when the prospective changes. Looks like it would be good if it went where you tell it to. Might be due to latest patch so will try again if it get fixed

Awesome Game... no need to spend money to get best cards you can easily earn them... Can play offline too... There is a glitch though in season 7 - save 8 second stage... even after finishing it wont give 3 stars and fails me.

Game is awesome. There is a perfect race on season 7 where you need to save 8 seconds. Think there's a glitch as I've done it 6 times and it doesn't count 2nd and 3rd lap sometimes. Please fix this it's my only star Left!

I hope in the new update you can upgrade the engine and body kits as well. That would bring back the fast and the furious Season 7 track 6 nexts to be check it says three lap but you are basicly doing lap 2 twice and it says wrong way. Third lap starts when u finish three laps and doing 4th lap counts as 3rd lap. Needs to be looked at this is cheating  u guys are doing

The stage is complete but I didn't get any of the cash rewards or the cards. Please fix this or at least give me the rewards I didn't get. Will give it a 5 stars then.

comments: Good game for passing time, satisfying and simple. I have noticed one small bug in the game, after trying out characters (before buying) I'm not able to go back to the story, it keeps thinking I'm still in trial mode when I start. Using oneplus 5t. Thanks

It's tricky to get an action game working on mobile, but this one pulls it off better than most I've seen. The controls are placed and sized very well, the main contributing factor. Additionally, the art is quite good and is a pleasure to look at while playing.
I don't know how but when I try to fight the final boss, it just let me through the level without defeating it. When I try to play the same level, the boss(es) do not spawn. Fix this pls

PLEASE stop automatically playing ads I like requesting ads NOT having to watch 2 ads to double my rewards after a level and one of the destroy 50 drones filled up but I can't claim reward plus the bonus towers NEED work because after I collect the bonus the GooglePlay page pops up after during gameplay.  So please fix these issues THEN add the multiplayer and the defense mode thanks in advance.
Love the game it looks amazing but it's hard to keep up with all the different enemy's later in the game.. maybe you can add a book about the enemy's so we can.learn.more

I think that the developers should spend time trying to fix the little bugs in the game play. (Walls opening before the end of a boss fight, survival mode losing progress, etc...) Additionally, I don't think that the Light Bringer lived up to the 15,000 souls you pay for him/her/it... The Lighting Blade is more powerful for less in-game currency. I think if the character is the slowest in the game, boosts should be given to defense and offense, or the fluidity of moves should be optimized. Right now, Light Bringer is a character to screw around with and not take seriously; however, if more thought went into the skill set to allow for more strategy-based combo attacks, I feel like the character could open another dimension of play style for the game.   *Update* the new version of the game should be re-looked at, the new character, has practically no health, and the last level no longer has characters, also, check the English in the defense mode description

descriptionHTML:
In the future, a strong, outstanding species is created from the combination of humans, technology and black metal.
The government names them “shadow cyborg”, and allows every sector to have their own shadow security force (S.E.F), but all of theme have to be controlled by the Headquarter placed in Century city.
Everything seems so perfect, til the day Headquarter is under attacked by a Dark Clan.
CORE, a senior cyborg soldier discovers the plot too late.
The Lord Commander of S.E.F is hacked, he slays his soldier and replace them by new shadow cyborg generation to take over the government.
After the attack, CORE joins the rebel and heads to the city seeking revenge for his comrades and destroying the Dark Clan.
Overdrive is a combination hack n slash and action platformer with many weapons available: sword, buster sword, spear, twin dagger...with unique built-in combos.
Starting from the Dark Forest, you will face dangerous enemies and traps. In the fight, use your skill to avoid attack and make extraordinary combos.

FEATURES of Overdrive - Ninja Shadow Revenge game:
- Tutorial for newbie makes sure every player can know how to play
- Playable OFFLINE
- Smooth game control experience
- Discover poweful combos in each weapon, make game full of fun and suprising.
- Upgrade, customize & equip your hero with epic weapons & armor suits and more!
- Ultra-stunning scifi graphic & effect
- Giant boss with unique attack.

FIGHTING of Overdrive game:
- The screen’ll locked when enemies appear in the screen & you need to destroy numerous waves of enemies to continue going ahead.
- Using avoiding skills to survive? Killing enemies madly?
- Exploting traps & platforms to kill them?
- There are many strategies to handle them.

ADVENTURE & STORY:
- Not only combat but also challenge your self to complete each level with many dangerous platforms.

VARIOUS WEAPONS:
- Using different weapons ( Sword, Buster Sword, Spear,...) with their perfect combos bring unforgetable hack and slash game experience.
- Players can pick their best weapons and also upgrade weapons to unlock new stronger combos.

GRAPHIC & SOUND:
- Amazing scifi high quality graphic makes sure you will be suprised.
- It’s 2 available modes to set suitable graphic for your phone.

SO YOU GONNA BE THE HERO WHO SAVES THE WORLD? ENJOY NOW!

Have any question or feedback to make the game better? Please let us know.
Contact us via:
Email: gms.mobilegame@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mobilearcadegame/

70 Bowman St.
South Windsor, CT 06074

comments: This is an amazing rogue like. I only have one problem with the game - WHY IS THERE NO CONSOLE/PC VERSION?!? I would pay good money for a PC or console rendition of thus game. descriptionHTML:
“In a time of gun and sword, the magical stone that maintains the balance of the world is stolen by high-tech aliens. The world is hanging on a thin thread. It all depends on you retrieving the magical stone…”

We honestly can’t keep making it all up. Let’s just shoot some alien minions!

This is the game you have always wanted in your subconscious. Explore the dungeon, collect crazy weapons, dodge bullets and shoot‘em all up! Extremely easy and intuitive control; super smooth and enjoyable gameplay, mixed with rogue-like elements. Best shooter game you will find on the mobile store so far.

Features:
* Unique heroes, with unique ability.
* 170+ weapons waiting for you to explore.
* Randomly generated dungeon world, new experience every time.
* NPCs that actually matter! They will fight by your side!
* Auto-aim mechanism for super intuitive control.
* Many more features that you will find out in game.

Follow Us
Twitter: @ChillyRoom
Facebook: @chillyroomsoulknight

Note:
* To use the screen recording function, permission to write to external storage is required.

Почеревин Евгений, Алексей С. and Турусбеков Алихан for additional Russian localization.

descriptionHTML:
The most cute bear of the history is coming! This is an epic game, exciting levels continuously. What is more, this bubble shooting game for free!
How to Play:
- Aim and match bubbles where you want to shoot the bubble.
- To group 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.
- Clear all the bubbles on the screen to get to a new level.
- More than seven kinds of cute bear is waiting for you to unlock,you can invite five friends to unlock the special role.
- Less moves you pass a level, higher score you'll get.
- At the end of game,you will be awarded coins according to the score. the higher score you got, the more coin will be awarded.
- At the end of game,you can click the falling bubbles to get higher score

+ easy operation but lots of fun.
+ Gorgeous special effects and beautiful images.

descriptionHTML:
Epic 2017 Mobile Masterpiece - 3D MMORPG Mobile Game, Honor Against Darkness!

Leap through time and jump into a mysterious fantasy world! All sorts of real-time PvP battles and action are found in Honor Against Darkness. No matter if you wish to fight alone or team up with your allies, you’ll enjoy some of the most intense and challenging battles around!

【GAME FEATURES】
Brilliant 3D graphics and special effects
Built on Unity 3D, Honor Against Darkness displays some of the latest and graphics on mobile. You’ll be pleasantly surprised by the beauty of the various characters, pets, mounts and maps available.
Real-time PvP battles at all and any times
PvP is open game on all maps. Choose 1 vs. 1, team vs. team, or guild vs guild. Fight for honor and team up with friends and guild mates to challenge the top players on the server. If you’ve got enough willpower, anything is possible in this world.
Trade freely and buy or sell your equipment
Featuring an auction house, Honor Against Darkness allows you to auction off your loot – and for Diamonds! You’ll be able to sell unused or extra gear from monster drops or quest rewards for much needed in-game currency.
Level up with no limitations
With an offline auto-battle system, you’re able to level up even while you’re busy or offline! You’ll never be left behind, so rise up the ranks and become the top Honor Against Darkness warrior!

【COMMUNITY】
Visit our official Facebook page and forum for the latest news and announcements: )
Official Facebook -- https://www.facebook.com/HonorAgainstDarkness/
Official Website -- http://had.rastargames.com

description: Blossom Blitz Match 3 is an addicting and fun puzzle game, free to play straight on your Android or Tablet device. Spend a relaxing day at the lovely flower garden, explore hundreds of beautiful levels, blast colorful flowers and win levels. This completely addictive Blossom Blitz Match 3 game will keep you occupied for hours!Link the flowers and blast your way through hundreds of amazing match-3 levels filled with amazing graphics, unique items and splendid boosters. Clear the garden, and beat the challenges in this awesome puzzle adventure. Try it out now and get ready to enjoy the amazing matching game full of beautiful flowers. Play this fun game that will take you on the most wonderful journey! Create special combos to get a cool explosion!- Match 4 flowers to get a striped item of this color and create a line blast.- Match 5 lovely items in an L or T form to get a bomb that will explode surrounding items. - Match 5 colorful figures in a row to get a rainbow blast. Why you‚Äôll like it:üå∏  Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations.üå∏Addictive gameplay: swap and match the bright flowers, and be part of a breath-taking adventure!üå∏Fun game with simple, casual gameplay that‚Äôs easy to learn but challenging to master.üå∏ Hundreds fun and exciting levels.üå∏ Beautiful graphics and effects.üå∏ There is no life or time limit, so you can play as much as you like. üå∏ Completely FREE, download today to your Android or Tablet device and match your way to victory.üå∏ Never ending match-3 fun!Clear the board from all the colorful buds and items and win levels! Reach high scores and try to get 3 stars on every blooming level.  Play this incredible puzzle today, and get ready for an addictive ride. Play now, link 3 beautiful flowers, create amazing combinations and solve the brain teasers to blast them away and win exciting rewards! With so many exciting levels, awesome boosters and bonuses, Blossom Blitz match-3 game is a must have for your Android device. Play this addictive match 3 game and experience endless hours of fun and fascination!

comments: Initially, there is a lot you need to learn. You need to learn the controls first. I am experienced in playing air combat games, so I got handle on the controls immediately. They are not so hard. After that, the missions and challenges start. All missions from level-1 to level-8 are same, just the color of clouds change, everything else in all missions remain same. No interactive storyline at all in the missions. As the game progresses, you will find it difficult to survive with old and weak aircrafts, hence you will have to upgrade the aircrafts and equip them with superior weapons. This will make it easier to proceed further in the missions. But what after that? I have purchased the latest aircraft, I have equipped it with the best weapons, and I have very easily finished all the missions with 3 stars. What now??!! I think this game needs atleast a local offline multiplayer mode to play with friends. That way, even after the missions are over, it would still be a fun game to keep playing. Apart from this, everything else is good. Especially the Graphics and game controlls are fantastic.

Great game. Addicting. Controls have a slight hesitation, and the graphics lack detail and realness. However, still a great game. Adjust and fix what you can and 10-20 million will come quickly behind. Daily login and daily missions keep repeating failure reports?

3 stars with notes! Tested on Smartfren Andromax E2 B16C2H in March 3rd, 2018. Gameplay OK. User interface OK.  Graphic OK (need to add option). FX OK. Tilt Control is useless (need fix/improvement & sensitivity option). On screen joypad is not OK (need fix/improvement & sensitivity option). The game is actually can be played offline, keep it like that. For next update please use approach like Gunship Battle 3D made by Joycity and From The Sea made by Masilgames, as example.

comments: It is very fun and easy to play

In all honesty I LOVE Jetpack Joyride! The things I DON'T love are these: I don't love all the ads...it never use to have all these ads. I don't love that it freezes up on my phone 9/10 forcing me to force stop it to play it. I don't love the fact that despite having it on other android devices and having synced it after getting a new phone I STILL had to start from scratch.

I like this game for the most part. It has a few issues though. Half of the time when I watch a video for a reward it will play the whole video but then tell me "An error occurred. Please try again later." When that happens it doesn't give me the reward and it won't let me try again. But the thing that really bothers me is that it WILL NOT STOP sending me notifications. I've turned off notifications at least 20 times, but when I go back in 10 minutes later it's turned them on again without my permission. I've blocked notifications from the game in my phone settings and that stops it from displaying the notification but it still plays the alert sound every night. It's really starting to irritate me and if it isn't fixed soon I'm going to uninstall this and lower my rating.

I love the game overall, but the only downside I have for it, is how we're not getting discounts on jepacks and clothing anymore. I'm unsure if it's only an android thing, but I really miss that feature. That for me was the reason I grinded this game so much during the time, because I was able to buy them with 50% off, not just buy currency and get it straight away. It would be nice to see some more jepacks too, as well as other content.
Most addictive game I've played in years. Only gripe is when holding screen to speed up end of level timer it restarts 2-3 times.

The game is amazing. I've been playing this since it came out about 7 years ago. The thing is it brings back nostalgia for me and that plays a big part in the core gameplay for me. Thank you guys, you are amazing! One little issue though, sometimes the ads I watch for doubling the points or for the free revive don't work. It just says "an error occured" and it won't do anything. Could you please try to fix this. It's a shame after a good run not to be able the double my points or whenever I would need to revive, it just wouldn't work...

Had been really enjoying this game despite the consistent crashes.  Now; however, the game won't even start.  It stays stuck on the beginning loading screen.  Please fix and I will update my review.  EDIT:  issue fixed.  Looks like it was maintenance they didn't bother announcing until after the fact.  Love the game so still 5 stars but would be nice to have to some advance notice with these things.

Great game and graphics. Need to work on the optimization though as constant crashes occurs. Will also be thrilled to see rework on Yomo as he looks really plain in this game. Character collision and ability lock in also needs improvement, especially those with dashes which will be better to have single target lock in. Overall as a TG fan I love this game.

On top of that, lately I can't even start up the game, cuz I get stack on the loading screen before I can even log in into the server. Very disappointed. There's hoping the devs will fix that issue soon, since this game shows a lot of potential.

The game is absolutely amazing ^^ This is definitely one of the better start up games in the app store. I would love to see more improvement with the graphics, load time, and effects. I can't wait to see the characters that will be added next. If I may I'd like to suggest that everyone's eyeball fascinated mask maker be added. Uta is definitely one of my favorite characters and it's a shame Yomo was implemented but not Uta. Many wishes for this game ^^

description: Tokyo Ghoul: Dark War is an anime ARPG mobile game offcially authorized by Studio Pierrot and launched by GameSamba. In this game, experience the original story from Tokyo Ghoul, collect your favorite characters, face exciting challenges, battle together with other players and attend PVP events.- Especially designed for mobile devices!Enjoy a fun and simple mobile operation experience, simply touch the screen and play the game.- Next-gen graphics, delicate music and original sound effects will completely immerse you in the Tokyo Ghoul world!The game features stunning graphics and character skills. Travel through the dark Tokyo streets, Anteiku, CCG Laboratory and other familiar settings from the anime. Original anime clips will be used for game scenes, and the English-dubbed version of the anime will take you back to the Tokyo Ghoul world.- Choose your favorite characters! Select different Ghouls and CCG Investigators to fight together!Ken Kaneki, Touka Kirishima and other popular anime characters will appear in the game. You can choose from over 50 different characters. Even if characters belong to opposing sides, they can fight side by side on your team as you build the strongest combinations!- Multi-dimensional character growth system to develop characters in different ways!Collect, raise, grow, upgrade, equip, and choose different character combinations to make the best team. Create a unique formation of your own!- Rich solo and team gameplay!Besides the traditional solo challenge, the game also offers high level dungeons that requires team cooperation. If you love PVP mode, you will enjoy playing the MOBA mode as well. Call up your friends and fight to your heart‚Äôs content!
descriptionHTML:
Tokyo Ghoul: Dark War is an anime ARPG mobile game offcially authorized by Studio Pierrot and launched by GameSamba. In this game, experience the original story from Tokyo Ghoul, collect your favorite characters, face exciting challenges, battle together with other players and attend PVP events.

- Especially designed for mobile devices!
Enjoy a fun and simple mobile operation experience, simply touch the screen and play the game.

- Next-gen graphics, delicate music and original sound effects will completely immerse you in the Tokyo Ghoul world!
The game features stunning graphics and character skills. Travel through the dark Tokyo streets, Anteiku, CCG Laboratory and other familiar settings from the anime. Original anime clips will be used for game scenes, and the English-dubbed version of the anime will take you back to the Tokyo Ghoul world.

- Choose your favorite characters! Select different Ghouls and CCG Investigators to fight together!
Ken Kaneki, Touka Kirishima and other popular anime characters will appear in the game. You can choose from over 50 different characters. Even if characters belong to opposing sides, they can fight side by side on your team as you build the strongest combinations!

- Multi-dimensional character growth system to develop characters in different ways!
Collect, raise, grow, upgrade, equip, and choose different character combinations to make the best team. Create a unique formation of your own!

- Rich solo and team gameplay!
Besides the traditional solo challenge, the game also offers high level dungeons that requires team cooperation. If you love PVP mode, you will enjoy playing the MOBA mode as well. Call up your friends and fight to your heart’s content!

comments: I think WAR ROBOTS is amazing!  I love how you make all kinds of robots to put into battle! I like how the robots can have special defense's like sentry mode and sheilds.  I also think it is cool to have different battlefields and different robots to choose from! I like it when you make more robots for people to buy and put into battle. I wished that everyone would play this game. But, I was wondering if you could lower the prices for the special robots and guns? Thanks!  From, JulianüôÇüòé

This gets one star until the matches are EVEN. I PLAYED AGAINST A RAIJIN ON MY FIRST GAME! Other than that, good game. But pay to win. Bit I'm level 21 and hadn't bought anything and only played for month. And to all those people who claimed to have lost thousands, WHY, JUST WHY, DID YOU SPEND THAT MUCH ON, ON A,  ON A GAME!

Most of the players seem to get balanced out well, so games rely on some sound teamwork and strategy.. like the active chessboard on the Milenium Falcon in a New Hope with the game between Chewie  and C3-PO. Yeah, went there. Fun as heck. Just don't buy your way to the top tier... earn it through time and battles. Makes a victory with the team feel earned.. awesome job all

Reminds me of the mechs from some Animes. Fun. Easy to upgrades mechs and weapons by watching videos and going into open battles. Haven't joined a clan yet. Been playing for about two months now. The only complaint I have is facing lvl 30 players with lvl 12 Mk II mechs and weapons that clearly belong in higher leagues. I understand Pixonic's loyalties lay with their paying customers first. Because it costs money  to develop new mechs, weapons, and maps.  But something needs to be done about the Tankers. A week in the LP queue doesn't seem to be enough to discourage Tanking.  I still believe that the game is fun. And I won't let cheaters discourage me. Sooner or later I'll be up there in higher levels myself.

game keep disconnecting due to problems since last update  edited after reply from picnic  thanks  for the reply .    connection loss has decreased  for the past two days (update?)  anyhow this is great customer service and just for that you guys deserve a 5 star...great game  great service and maybe some disc bug but that is life and you seem to address them   I'm impressed

This is the longest running game I have on my phone...so that should tell you something. It's fun don't get me wrong but it started out as a great game but has now changed to a 2 star game due to the fact that they keep on making it more and more a pay to play game. If they keep going down this route I will need to quit. I don't mind paying for a good game but in game purchases are getting crazy.
description: War Robots is an action-packed multiplayer game with 6 vs. 6 team battles in real-time! Join the ranks of the Metal Warriors! "If you are looking for something new and love robots and multiplayer battles it's worth the download to check it out since initially it won‚Äôt cost you anything." - Droid Gamers"War Robots is an excellent game that works well no matter if you play it on your Android smartphone or tablet, and it‚Äôs such a good multiplayer game that it can give people a competitive challenge while on the move." - AndroidHeadlines"As a high-end, team-based online multiplayer mech game on Android, it's also fairly unique to the platform." - Android PoliceIt's a time of war, pilot! Destroy enemy robots, capture all the beacons, and upgrade your weapons to increase combat strength, speed, and durability of your battle robot. Create a war machine to fit your own play style;‚Äì create your own clan and lead it to glorious victories;‚Äì join epic PvP battles against rivals from all over the world;‚Äì complete military tasks for bonuses and earn the Best Pilot title.Onward, soldier! Victory is yours!Want to talk about the game or find allies?Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/warrobots/Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WWR_by_PixonicWatch new videos on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/WALKINGWARROBOTS Find all about WR on our Knowledge Base: http://faq.wwr.mobi/hc/en-us/Important note: This application requires a stable internet connection.Enjoy the game!
descriptionHTML:
War Robots is an action-packed multiplayer game with 6 vs. 6 team battles in real-time! Join the ranks of the Metal Warriors!

"If you are looking for something new and love robots and multiplayer battles it's worth the download to check it out since initially it won’t cost you anything." - Droid Gamers

"War Robots is an excellent game that works well no matter if you play it on your Android smartphone or tablet, and it’s such a good multiplayer game that it can give people a competitive challenge while on the move." - AndroidHeadlines

"As a high-end, team-based online multiplayer mech game on Android, it's also fairly unique to the platform." - Android Police

It's a time of war, pilot! Are you ready for surprise attacks, intricate tactical maneuvers and the many sneaky tricks your rivals have in store for you? Destroy enemy robots, capture all the beacons, and upgrade your weapons to increase combat strength, speed, and durability of your battle robot. Prove yourself in each map and use different strategies and tactics to emerge victorious from battle!

MAIN FEATURES:
– 34 battle robots with different strengths;
– more than 30 weapon types, including ballistic missiles, energy and plasma guns. What will you choose?
– many possible combinations of robots and weapons. Create a war machine to fit your own play style;
– create your own clan and lead it to glorious victories;
– join epic PvP battles against rivals from all over the world;
– complete military tasks for bonuses and earn the Best Pilot title.

Onward, soldier! Victory is yours!

Want to talk about the game or find allies?
Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/warrobots/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WWR_by_Pixonic
Watch new videos on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/WALKINGWARROBOTS
Find all about WR on our Knowledge Base: http://faq.wwr.mobi/hc/en-us/

Important note: This application requires a stable internet connection.
Enjoy the game!

comments: Recently updated it and found that my previous game profile of was reset to a flock power of zero. And I am not able to play the arena without the app shutting down several times, it's frustrating! I don't understand why the updated version is so bad.. isn't it supposed to be getting better with each version?

I just purchased a new phone. And being I'm using the same e-mail address i would have thought it would have started me at the same level I had been on prior to the new phone. Kinda sucks because i had spent a near fortune and was at level 64 ! Unless they can fix this I will remove the game for good. I mean I had every hat except the ones that cost 25,000. Now I'm at zero!

Classic gameply bogged down by aggravating fremium distration. Havent run into any energy bars yet and already on second world. New birds add interesting gameplay elements but spells are an automatic win that add no semse of achievement besides skipping a hard level. If you want some classic angry birds but dont mind clicking through to get to it then give this a download.

There is an extremely annoying ad that will freeze the app, I don't know what it is for, but it's animated, shows a city street, moving van, starts at 36 sec.  I can't leave it when it freezes, have to leave app entirely, go back to where I left. If I click again and same app appears I can't receive my reward.

I really think the tower is rigged. 1 in 4 chance of getting the pig but it seems to happen ALL the time. Cant get past the 6th or 7th floor. However if you spend lots o money to buy gems I guess it can be done. Not for me I am out.

He game starts out with tutorials, but they act like you've never played angry birds before. Theres a world map which is cool, but its not needed and is just boring. The worst part about this game is that you can only lose 5 times a day. I just want to play the game like how the original game played!
